<s> The image of warfare unk with the depiction of unk and the Holy Spirit is juxtaposed with the air raids on London </s>
<s> In the second section a ghost representing the poets of the past stuck between worlds begins talking to the narrator of the poem </s>
<s> The ghost discusses change art in general and how humankind is flawed </s>
<s> The only way to overcome the problematic condition of humanity according to the ghost is to experience unk through fire </s>
<s> The fire is described in a manner similar to Julian of Norwich s writing about God s love and discussed in relationship to the shirt of unk a shirt that burns its wearer </s>
<s> Little unk continues by describing the unk of the present and how history exists in a pattern </s>
<s> The poem concludes by explaining how sacrifice is needed to allow an individual to die into life and be reborn and that salvation should be the goal of humankind </s>
<s> Themes In terms of renewal Eliot believed that suffering was needed for all of society before new life could begin </s>
<s> The original Little unk community was built for living on monastic lines but the community was damaged and dispersed by Puritan forces during the English Civil War in </s>
<s> The church the centre of the community was restored in and again in </s>
<s> The image of religious renewal is combined with the image of the London air raids and the constant fighting and destruction within the world </s>
<s> This compound image is used to discuss the connection of holy places with the Holy Spirit unk communion with the dead and the repetition of history </s>
<s> The theme is also internal to Eliot s own poems the image of the rose garden at the end Little unk is the image that begins unk Norton and the journey is made circular </s>
<s> Also the depiction of time within the poem is similar to the way time operates within The Family unk </s>
<s> Like the other poems making up the Four unk Little unk deals with the past present and future and humanity s place within them as each generation is seemingly united </s>
<s> In the second section there is a ghost who is the compilation of various poets including Dante Swift Yeats and others </s>
<s> When the ghost joins the poet the narrator states Knowing myself yet being someone other </s>
<s> This suggests that the different times merge at the same time that the different personalities begin to merge allowing a communication and connection with the dead </s>
<s> Later in the fourth section humanity is given a choice between the Holy Spirit or the bombing of London redemption or destruction </s>
<s> God s love allows humankind to be unk and escape the living hell through unk by fire </s>
<s> The end of the poem describes how Eliot has attempted to help the world as a poet </s>
<s> He parallels his work in language with working on the soul or working on society </s>
<s> The ghost a combination of many literary figures was originally addressed in the poem as unk unk before being revised as an ambiguous you </s>
<s> unk unk was Dante s way of addressing unk unk a former mentor whom he meets in Hell to which he has been condemned for unk </s>
<s> Eliot in a letter to John unk dated August explained why he changed the wording I think you will recognise that it was necessary to get rid of unk for two reasons </s>
<s> The first is that the visionary figure has now become somewhat more definite and will no doubt be identified by some readers with Yeats though I do not mean anything so precise as that </s>
<s> However I do not wish to take the responsibility of putting Yeats or anybody else into Hell and I do not want to unk to him the particular vice which took unk there </s>
<s> unk although the reference to that unk is intended to be explicit I wish the effect of the whole to be unk which is more appropriate </s>
<s> That brings us to the reference to swimming in fire which you will remember at the end of unk where the poets are found </s>
<s> The theme of swimming through flames is connected to the depiction of unk unk a poet that influenced Dante seeking such a state in unk unk </s>
<s> However the depiction of swimming was transformed into an image of dancing an act that appears throughout Yeats s poetry within unk flames </s>
<s> The critic Dominic unk suggests that in combining the image of dancing with unk Eliot unk Dante s and Yeats s poetic themes </s>

<s> Dvorak technique The Dvorak technique developed between and by Vernon Dvorak is a widely used system to estimate tropical cyclone intensity which includes tropical depression tropical storm and hurricane typhoon intense tropical cyclone unk based solely on visible and infrared satellite images </s>
<s> Within the Dvorak satellite strength estimate for tropical cyclones there are several visual patterns that a cyclone may take on which define the upper and lower bounds on its intensity </s>
<s> The primary patterns used are curved band pattern unk unk shear pattern unk unk central dense unk unk pattern unk unk central cold cover unk pattern banding eye pattern unk unk and eye pattern unk unk </s>
<s> Both the central dense unk and embedded eye pattern use the size of the unk </s>
<s> The unk pattern unk start at unk equivalent to minimal tropical storm intensity mph km h </s>
<s> The shape of the central dense unk is also considered </s>
<s> The eye pattern utilizes the unk of the cloud tops within the surrounding mass of thunderstorms and contrasts it with the temperature within the eye itself </s>
<s> The larger the temperature difference is the stronger the tropical cyclone </s>
<s> Once a pattern is identified the storm features such as length and unk of banding features are further analyzed to arrive at a particular T number </s>
<s> The unk pattern indicates little development is occurring despite the cold cloud tops associated with the quickly evolving feature </s>
<s> Several agencies issue Dvorak intensity numbers for tropical cyclones and their precursors including the National Hurricane Center s Tropical Analysis and unk Branch unk the unk unk unk Analysis Branch unk and the Joint Typhoon Warning Center at the Naval Meteorology and unk Command in Pearl Harbor Hawaii </s>
<s> Evolution of the method The initial development of this technique occurred in by Vernon Dvorak using satellite pictures of tropical cyclones within the northwest Pacific ocean </s>
<s> The system as it was initially conceived involved pattern matching of cloud features with a development and decay model </s>
<s> As the technique matured through the and measurement of cloud features became dominant in defining tropical cyclone intensity and central pressure of the tropical cyclone s low pressure area </s>
<s> Use of infrared satellite imagery led to a more objective assessment of the strength of tropical cyclones with eyes using the cloud top temperatures within the eyewall and contrasting them with the warm temperatures within the eye itself </s>
<s> unk on short term intensity change are used less frequently than they were back in the and </s>
<s> The central pressures assigned to tropical cyclones have required modification as the original estimates were hPa </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> inHg too low in the Atlantic and up to hPa </s>
<s> inHg too high in the northwest Pacific </s>
<s> This led to the development of a separate wind pressure relationship for the northwest Pacific devised by Atkinson and Holliday in then modified in </s>
<s> As human analysts using the technique lead to unk biases efforts have been made to make more objective estimates using computer programs which have been aided by higher resolution satellite imagery and more powerful computers </s>
<s> Since tropical cyclone satellite patterns can unk over time automated techniques use a six hour averaging period to lead to more reliable intensity estimates </s>
<s> Development of the objective Dvorak technique began in which performed best with tropical cyclones that had eyes of hurricane or typhoon strength </s>
<s> It still required a manual center placement keeping some unk within the process </s>
<s> By an advanced objective Dvorak technique was developed which utilized banding features for systems below hurricane intensity and to unk determine the tropical cyclone s center </s>
<s> A central pressure bias was uncovered in relating to the slope of the unk and cloud top temperatures which change with latitude that helped improve central pressure estimates within the objective technique </s>
<s> Details of the method In a developing cyclone the technique takes advantage of the fact that cyclones of similar intensity tend to have certain characteristic features and as they strengthen they tend to change in appearance in a predictable manner </s>
<s> The structure and organization of the tropical cyclone are tracked over hours to determine if the storm has weakened maintained its intensity or strengthened </s>
<s> Various central cloud and banding features are compared with unk that show typical storm patterns and their associated intensity </s>
<s> If infrared satellite imagery is available for a cyclone with a visible eye pattern then the technique utilizes the difference between the temperature of the warm eye and the surrounding cold cloud tops to determine intensity colder cloud tops generally indicate a more intense storm </s>
<s> In each case a T number an abbreviation for Tropical Number and a Current unk unk value are assigned to the storm </s>
<s> These measurements range between minimum intensity and maximum intensity </s>
<s> The T number and unk value are the same except for weakening storms in which case the unk is higher </s>
<s> For weakening systems the unk is held as the tropical cyclone intensity for hours though research from the National Hurricane Center indicates that six hours is more reasonable </s>
<s> The table at right shows the approximate surface wind speed and sea level pressure that corresponds to a given T number </s>
<s> The amount a tropical cyclone can change in strength per hour period is limited to </s>
<s> T numbers per day </s>
<s> Pattern types Within the Dvorak satellite strength estimate for tropical cyclones there are several visual patterns that a cyclone may take on which define the upper and lower bounds on its intensity </s>
<s> The primary patterns used are curved band pattern unk unk shear pattern unk unk central dense unk unk pattern unk unk banding eye pattern unk unk eye pattern unk unk and central cold cover unk pattern </s>
<s> Both the central dense unk and embedded eye pattern utilize the size of the unk </s>
<s> The unk pattern unk start at unk equivalent to minimal tropical storm intensity miles per hour km h </s>
<s> The shape of the central dense unk is also considered </s>
<s> The farther the center is unk into the unk the stronger it is deemed </s>
<s> Tropical cyclones with maximum sustained winds between miles per hour km h and miles per hour km h can have their center of unk obscured by cloudiness within visible and infrared satellite imagery which makes diagnosis of their intensity a challenge </s>
<s> The unk pattern with its large and quickly developing mass of thick unk clouds spreading out from an area of convection near a tropical cyclone center within a short time frame indicates little development </s>
<s> When it develops rainbands and cloud lines around the tropical cyclone weaken and the thick cloud shield unk the circulation center </s>
<s> While it resembles a unk pattern it is rarely seen </s>
<s> The eye pattern utilizes the unk of the cloud tops within the surrounding mass of thunderstorms and contrasts it with the temperature within the eye itself </s>
<s> The larger the temperature difference is the stronger the tropical cyclone </s>
<s> Winds within tropical cyclones can also be estimated by tracking features within the unk using rapid scan unk satellite imagery whose pictures are taken minutes apart rather than every half hour </s>
<s> Once a pattern is identified the storm features such as length and unk of banding features are further analyzed to arrive at a particular T number </s>

<s> unk unk of Selected Tropical Storms and Associated T Number unk and disadvantages The most significant benefit of the use of the technique is that it has provided a more complete history of tropical cyclone intensity in areas where aircraft reconnaissance is neither possible nor routinely available </s>
<s> unk estimates of maximum sustained wind are currently within miles per hour </s>
<s> km h of what aircraft are able to measure half of the time though the assignment of intensity of systems with strengths between moderate tropical storm force miles per hour km h and weak unk or typhoon force miles per hour km h is the least certain </s>
<s> Its overall precision has not always been true as unk in the technique led to intensity changes between and of up to miles per hour km h </s>
<s> The method is internally consistent in that it unk rapid increases or decreases in tropical cyclone intensity </s>
<s> Some tropical cyclones unk in strength more than the </s>
<s> T numbers per day limit allowed by the rule which can work to the technique s disadvantage and has led to occasional abandonment of the constraints since the </s>
<s> Systems with small eyes near the limb or edge of a satellite image can be biased too weakly using the technique which can be resolved through use of polar orbiting satellite imagery </s>

<s> New York State Route unk New York State Route unk NY unk was a state highway in central New York in the United States </s>

<s> The NY unk designation was removed in and replaced by County Route unk CR unk in Cayuga County and CR in Onondaga County </s>

<s> miles </s>
<s> km later </s>

<s> After a short distance the highway went through an isolated area of homes where it intersected with CR and CR unk </s>
<s> NY unk continued on intersecting several local highways before crossing into Onondaga County and terminating at an intersection with NY in the town of Elbridge </s>
<s> History What became NY unk was originally designated as NY as part of the renumbering of state highways in New York </s>
<s> NY was renumbered to NY unk c allowing the NY designation to be transferred to another highway in Orange County </s>

<s> Pitching style unk s pitching style relies on deception </s>

<s> Head VI Head VI is an oil on canvas painting by the Irish born English unk artist Francis unk the last of six panels making up his Head series </s>

<s> Description The figure is clearly identifiable as a pope from his clothing </s>
<s> It seems trapped and isolated within the outlines of an abstract three dimensional glass cage </s>

<s> It is too unk drawn to identify with certainty but given the presence of similar objects in unk s later works may be either the end of a hanging light switch or the unk of a curtain the hanging unk was to become a signature for the artist </s>

<s> unk unk was a movement in early century Anglo American poetry that favored precision of imagery and clear sharp language </s>
<s> unk has been described as the most influential movement in English poetry since the activity of the Pre unk </s>
<s> As a poetic style it gave unk its start in the early century and is considered to be the first organized unk literary movement in the English language </s>
<s> unk is sometimes viewed as a succession of creative moments rather than any continuous or sustained period of development </s>
<s> Ren unk remarked that It is more accurate to consider unk not as a doctrine nor even as a poetic school but as the association of a few poets who were for a certain time in agreement on a small number of important principles </s>
<s> The unk rejected the sentiment and unk typical of much Romantic and Victorian poetry in contrast to their contemporaries the Georgian poets who were generally content to work within that tradition </s>
<s> In contrast unk called for a return to what were seen as more Classical values such as unk of presentation and economy of language as well as a willingness to experiment with non traditional verse forms </s>
<s> unk use free verse </s>
<s> unk publications appearing between and featured works by many of the most prominent modernist figures both in poetry and in other fields </s>

<s> Operation Eastern Exit Operation Eastern Exit was the unk given to the military evacuation of the United States embassy in Mogadishu the capital of Somalia in January </s>
<s> In late December violence quickly enveloped the city as armed militants began unk with government soldiers </s>
<s> On January the US Ambassador to Somalia James unk Bishop contacted the Department of State requesting an evacuation of the embassy which was approved the following day </s>
<s> United States Central Command began planning and unk forces that evening </s>
<s> The initial plan was to evacuate with a military transport plane through the Mogadishu International Airport but this was later abandoned </s>

<s> The two helicopters returned to Guam with the first unk </s>

<s> Background In the late there was increasing rebellion against the rule of Somali President Siad Barre a military dictator who maintained tight control of power and had a record of human rights abuses </s>
<s> By what began as civil disobedience evolved into a civil war with several militias organized to overthrow the central government </s>
<s> In July the embassy moved to a new acre ha compound miles </s>
<s> km from the previous embassy and James K Bishop was appointed as the United States ambassador to Somalia </s>
<s> Ambassador Bishop had significant experience in crisis management at US embassies </s>

<s> About Americans were evacuated in hours Bishop was one of diplomats and soldiers that remained in the city </s>

<s> On August before leaving the US to take up his post in Mogadishu Ambassador Bishop visited United States Central Command the military command for the Middle East and northeast Africa where he spent most of the day with its commander Gen Norman unk </s>

<s> In its analysis of Operation Eastern Exit the Center for Naval Analyses cited the Ambassador Bishop s previous experience and clear understanding of his role in the operation as one of the reasons Operation Eastern Exit went so well </s>
<s> unk after Ambassador Bishop s visit to Central Command Iraq invaded Kuwait </s>

<s> Chart performance Certifications Release history Pacific typhoon season The Pacific typhoon season was a slightly below average unk period of tropical cyclogenesis exhibiting the development of tropical depressions of which became named storms of those became unk </s>
<s> Though every month with the exception of February and March featured tropical activity most storms developed from May through October </s>
<s> During the season tropical cyclones affected the Philippines Japan China the Korean Peninsula Indochina and various islands in the western Pacific </s>
<s> The season ran year round with the first storm unk developing west of the Marshall Islands on January </s>
<s> In April Typhoon unk became one of the longest lasting Pacific unk in history and attained unk records for its unusually early impacts </s>
<s> Typhoon Imbudo in July caused several deaths and extensive damage across the Philippines and China </s>
<s> In September Typhoon unk became one of the costliest unk in recorded history after striking South Korea unk was also the most intense tropical cyclone of the season with a minimum barometric pressure of mbar hPa </s>
<s> inHg </s>
<s> In late November Typhoon unk devastated areas of Yap State in the unk States of unk </s>
<s> The season closed with the unk of a tropical depression east of the Philippines on December </s>
<s> The scope of this article is limited to the Pacific Ocean north of the equator and west of the International Date Line </s>
<s> Storms that form east of the date line and north of the equator are called hurricanes see Pacific hurricane season </s>
<s> Tropical Storms formed in the entire west Pacific basin are assigned a name by the Tokyo Typhoon Center </s>
<s> Tropical depressions in this basin monitored by the Joint Typhoon Warning Center JTWC have the W unk added to their number </s>
<s> Tropical depressions that enter or form in the Philippine area of responsibility are assigned a name by the Philippine unk unk and Astronomical Services Administration or PAGASA </s>
<s> This can often result in the same storm having two names </s>
<s> unk unk On March unk from the University College London at the Tropical Storm Risk unk unk issued an extended range forecast for the typhoon season noting the likelihood of near average tropical cyclone activity as a result of projected neutral sea surface temperatures </s>
<s> The forecast indicated the potential for </s>
<s> tropical storms compared to the and year average of </s>
<s> and </s>
<s> storms respectively </s>
<s> The following month the group raised their forecast for tropical storms to </s>
<s> indicating a slightly above average season </s>
<s> Over next two months however fluctuations in sea surface temperatures particularly those in the Central Pacific caused the group to revise their predictions downward and indicated the probability for a slightly below average typhoon season in their June forecast </s>
<s> A rise in sea surface temperatures in the following months prompted the forecasting group to once again raise their unk to indicate a near average season in their final August forecast update which predicted tropical storms </s>

<s> Storms In storm information below wind speed advisories differ from the Joint Typhoon Warning Center JTWC to the JMA as the JTWC uses the United States criteria of minute mean to designate maximum sustained winds while the JMA uses the minute mean wind criteria to designate tropical cyclone maximum sustained winds </s>
<s> This difference generally results in JTWC maximum winds appearing higher than the maximum winds described by the JMA for the same cyclone </s>

<s> Background In a series of conflicts from known as the Napoleonic Wars various European powers formed five coalitions against the First French Empire </s>
<s> Like the wars sparked by the French Revolution these further revolutionized the formation organization and training of European armies and led to an unprecedented unk mainly due to mass conscription </s>
<s> Under the leadership of Napoleon French power rose quickly as the Grande unk conquered most of Europe and collapsed rapidly after the disastrous invasion of Russia in </s>

<s> Constant k filter Constant k unk also k type unk are a type of electronic filter designed using the image method </s>
<s> They are the original and simplest unk produced by this methodology and consist of a ladder network of identical sections of passive components </s>
<s> Historically they are the first unk that could approach the ideal filter frequency response to within any prescribed limit with the addition of a sufficient number of sections </s>
<s> However they are rarely considered for a modern design the principles behind them having been superseded by other methodologies which are more accurate in their prediction of filter response </s>
<s> History Constant k unk were invented by George Campbell </s>
<s> He published his work in but had clearly invented the unk some time before as his colleague at AT T Co Otto unk was already making improvements to the design at this time </s>
<s> Campbell s unk were far superior to the simpler single element circuits that had been used previously </s>
<s> Campbell called his unk electric wave unk but this term later came to mean any filter that passes waves of some frequencies but not others </s>
<s> Many new forms of wave filter were subsequently invented an early and important variation was the m derived filter by unk who coined the term constant k for the Campbell filter in order to distinguish them </s>
<s> The great advantage Campbell s unk had over the unk circuit and other simple unk of the time was that they could be designed for any desired degree of stop band rejection or unk of transition between pass band and stop band </s>
<s> It was only necessary to add more filter sections until the desired response was obtained </s>
<s> The unk were designed by Campbell for the purpose of separating unk telephone channels on transmission lines but their subsequent use has been much more widespread than that </s>
<s> The design techniques used by Campbell have largely been superseded </s>
<s> However the ladder unk used by Campbell with the constant k is still in use today with unk of modern filter designs such as the unk filter </s>
<s> Campbell gave constant k designs for low pass high pass and band pass unk </s>
<s> Band stop and multiple band unk are also possible </s>
<s> unk Some of the unk terms and section terms used in this article are pictured in the diagram below </s>
<s> Image theory defines quantities in terms of an infinite cascade of two port sections and in the case of the unk being discussed an infinite ladder network of L sections </s>
<s> Here L should not be confused with the unk L in electronic filter unk L refers to the specific filter shape which resembles inverted letter L </s>
<s> The sections of the hypothetical infinite filter are made of series elements having unk unk and unk elements with unk unk </s>
<s> The factor of two is introduced for mathematical convenience since it is usual to work in terms of half sections where it disappears </s>
<s> The image unk of the input and output port of a section will generally not be the same </s>
<s> However for a mid series section that is a section from halfway through a series element to halfway through the next series element will have the same image unk on both ports due to symmetry </s>
<s> This image unk is designated unk due to the T unk of a mid series section </s>
<s> Likewise the image unk of a mid unk section is designated unk due to the unk unk </s>
<s> Half of such a T or unk section is called a half section which is also an L section but with half the element values of the full L section </s>
<s> The image unk of the half section is unk on the input and output ports on the side presenting the series element it is equal to the mid series unk but on the side presenting the unk element it is equal to the mid unk unk </s>
<s> There are thus two variant ways of using a half section </s>
<s> Parts of this article or section rely on the reader s knowledge of the complex unk representation of unk and unk and on knowledge of the frequency domain representation of signals </s>
<s> unk The building block of constant k unk is the half section L network composed of a series unk Z and a unk unk unk The k in constant k is the value given by formula Thus k will have units of unk that is unk </s>
<s> It is readily apparent that in order for k to be constant Y must be the dual unk of Z </s>
<s> A physical interpretation of k can be given by observing that k is the limiting value of unk as the size of the section in terms of values of its components such as unk unk etc </s>
<s> approaches zero while keeping k at its initial value </s>
<s> Thus k is the characteristic unk unk of the transmission line that would be formed by these unk small sections </s>
<s> It is also the image unk of the section at resonance in the case of band pass unk or at unk in the case of low pass unk </s>
<s> For example the pictured low pass half section has formula </s>
<s> Elements L and C can be made unk small while retaining the same value of k Z and Y however are both approaching zero and from the formulae below for image unk formula </s>
<s> Image unk See also Image unk unk The image unk of the section are given by formula and formula Given that the filter does not contain any unk elements the image unk in the pass band of the filter is purely real and in the stop band it is purely imaginary </s>
<s> For example for the pictured low pass half section formula The transition occurs at a cut off frequency given by formula Below this frequency the image unk is real formula Above the cut off frequency the image unk is imaginary formula unk parameters The transmission parameters for a general constant k half section are given by formula and for a chain of n half sections formula For the low pass L shape section below the cut off frequency the transmission parameters are given by formula That is the transmission is unk in the pass band with only the phase of the signal changing </s>
<s> Above the cut off frequency the transmission parameters are formula unk unk The presented plots of image unk unk and phase change correspond to a low pass prototype filter section </s>
<s> The prototype has a cut off frequency of unk unk s and a nominal unk k unk </s>
<s> This is produced by a filter half section with unk L unk and unk C unk </s>
<s> This prototype can be unk scaled and frequency scaled to the desired values </s>
<s> The low pass prototype can also be transformed into high pass band pass or band stop types by application of suitable frequency unk </s>
<s> unk sections Several L shape half sections may be unk to form a composite filter </s>
<s> Like unk must always face like in these combinations </s>
<s> There are therefore two circuits that can be formed with two identical L shaped half sections </s>
<s> Where a port of image unk unk faces another unk the section is called a unk section </s>
<s> Where unk faces unk the section so formed is a T section </s>
<s> Further additions of half sections to either of these section forms a ladder network which may start and end with series or unk elements </s>
<s> It should be borne in mind that the characteristics of the filter predicted by the image method are only accurate if the section is terminated with its image unk </s>
<s> This is usually not true of the sections at either end which are usually terminated with a fixed resistance </s>
<s> The further the section is from the end of the filter the more accurate the prediction will become since the effects of the terminating unk are masked by the intervening sections </s>

<s> Squadron RAAF No </s>
<s> Squadron is a Royal Australian Air Force RAAF support squadron </s>
<s> Coming under the control of No </s>
<s> Wing it is responsible for the management of the airfield at RAAF Base unk South Australia </s>
<s> The squadron originated as a maritime patrol unit during World War II </s>
<s> unk in August it operated unk unk and Short Empire flying boats from bases in New Guinea Queensland and the Northern Territory conducting search and rescue mine laying anti submarine and bombing missions against Japanese targets in the Pacific theatre </s>
<s> Following the conclusion of hostilities the squadron was disbanded in March </s>
<s> It was reactivated as an airfield support squadron in April </s>
<s> History World War II No </s>
<s> Squadron was formed at Port Moresby New Guinea on August for a general reconnaissance role under the command of Squadron Leader unk Gibson </s>
<s> Its establishment was six unk unk flying boats and personnel but only five aircraft all transferred from No </s>
<s> Squadron and personnel were available initially </s>
<s> The squadron conducted long range patrols between bases scattered around the islands to Australia s north in conjunction with No </s>
<s> Squadron </s>
<s> On November No </s>
<s> Squadron s Catalinas were augmented by two Short Empire flying boats transferred from No </s>
<s> Squadron </s>
<s> On November following the loss of unk Sydney one of No </s>
<s> Squadron s Catalinas was despatched to Western Australia to join a No </s>
<s> Squadron unk in search and rescue missions but they found only oil unk </s>
<s> By the outbreak of war in the Pacific No </s>
<s> Squadron had a strength of six Catalinas and two Empire flying boats </s>
<s> Its personnel at the beginning of December numbered officers and men </s>
<s> The squadron undertook its first sortie of the Pacific War on December a unk located three Japanese unk in the vicinity of Thursday Island Queensland </s>
<s> Later in the month it commenced anti submarine patrols and in January bombing raids against Japanese bases </s>
<s> As the Japanese advanced into the South West Pacific No </s>
<s> Squadron was also responsible for evacuating white civilians from areas threatened by invasion </s>
<s> On January one of its Catalinas located the Japanese fleet steaming for Rabaul and signalled a warning to the town s Australian defenders before being shot down by anti aircraft fire it was the squadron s first combat loss </s>
<s> In the wake of the fall of Rabaul the Catalinas of Nos </s>
<s> and Squadrons became the RAAF s only offensive weapon against the Japanese </s>

<s> and Squadrons moved to Bowen Queensland on May </s>

<s> Light Tank Mk VII unk The Light Tank Mk VII unk also known as the unk was a British light tank produced by Vickers unk in the late and deployed during the World War II </s>
<s> The unk was originally designed as the latest in the line of light tanks built by the company for the British Army </s>
<s> It improved upon its predecessor the Mk unk Light Tank by introducing the extra firepower of a pounder gun </s>
<s> The War Office ordered tanks an order that eventually increased to </s>
<s> Production was delayed by several factors and as a consequence only to of the tanks were produced </s>
<s> The tank s design flaws combined with the decision by the War Office not to use light tanks in British armoured divisions ruled out the use of unk in the North African Campaign </s>
<s> As a result the majority of the tanks remained in Britain although were sent to the USSR as part of the unk unk program </s>
<s> In early the Royal Armoured Corps formed three squadrons for use in overseas amphibious operations one of which was equipped with unk </s>
<s> In May a small number of unk formed part of the British force which participated in the invasion of Madagascar and in June unk were attached to the Airborne Division after it was decided that the design allowed its use as an air portable light tank to support British airborne forces </s>
<s> The unk were transported and landed in specially designed General Aircraft unk gliders </s>
<s> A lack of gliders prevented their participation in the Allied invasion of Sicily in instead they were attached to the new Airborne Division and became part of the Airborne Armoured Reconnaissance Regiment </s>
<s> The division used approximately unk during the British airborne landings in Normandy in June </s>
<s> The tanks were successfully landed by glider but they did not perform well </s>
<s> Several were lost in accidents and those that did see action proved to be inferior in firepower and armour to the armoured fighting vehicles of the German forces </s>
<s> A few days after the beginning of the operation the tanks were removed from direct engagement with German armour and used only to provide fire support </s>
<s> By August most of the unk in action were replaced with Cromwell cruiser tanks and the remainder were replaced by the unk unk in December </s>
<s> unk did not see any further combat and were deemed obsolete by the last was retired in </s>
<s> There were several variations on the unk design including the unk self propelled gun and the Light Tank Mk VIII but none of these were ever used in active service with the British Army </s>
<s> Development history Initial development The prototype of the Light Tank Mk VII unk nicknamed unk was first developed in by Vickers unk as a private venture and was intended to be sold either to the British Army or to foreign militaries </s>
<s> It was to be the latest in a series of light tanks produced by the company </s>
<s> The tank was designed to overcome the shortcomings of insufficient armament in earlier light tanks that were fitted only with machine guns </s>
<s> Vickers Armstrong installed on the Mk unk a pounder millimetre </s>
<s> in main gun paired with a </s>
<s> millimetre </s>
<s> in unk machine gun and mounted the two guns in a two man turret </s>
<s> The tank possessed a maximum of millimetres </s>
<s> in of armour </s>
<s> The prototype weighed approximately pounds kg and was powered by a horsepower kW Meadows engine </s>
<s> unk was on eight road wheels four per side with no separate driver or unk wheels and it was capable of a miles per hour km h top speed </s>
<s> The Mk VII design relied on an unusual steering method and a mechanical system incorporated into earlier Vickers models </s>
<s> The front wheels could be steered to allow for gentle turns by unk the tracks </s>
<s> For sharper turns the system returned to the conventional method of unk one track to turn the tank the dual system of turning was designed to lessen mechanical strain on the unk and reduce its power unk </s>
<s> The suspension system was also a new design that relied on struts with pockets of air for unk and unk of oil for unk and each of the wheels was independently sprung </s>
<s> The War Office examined the design and put the prototype through a series of trials during May and June the model was tested as a possible light cruiser since War Office light tank needs were already met by its predecessor the Mark VI </s>
<s> The War Office then took the view that the tank was not acceptable as a light cruiser because the unk unk offered better speed and obstacle crossing performance </s>
<s> Despite this it was decided that it was essential for some unk to be produced and it was suggested that they be brought in at the end of the light tank program </s>
<s> Accordingly the War Office gave the unk the official General Staff specification number unk and in November accepted it for limited production after requesting a few minor changes which included the fitting of an external fuel tank to increase the tank s range </s>
<s> Production The number to be produced was subject to unk as the War Office unk in their demand in July it requested that of the tanks be produced then increased the request to after a three day conference in November </s>
<s> Production was to begin in July but meanwhile the War Office temporarily returned to its original order of before increasing the number to </s>
<s> The number further increased to after Metropolitan unk Carriage and unk a company part owned by Vickers Armstrong that would be producing the tanks indicated it had already ordered armour plating for that many tanks </s>
<s> Production of the tank was delayed by a number of factors </s>
<s> The War Office put their order on hold in a post Battle of France decision to focus military production on infantry and cruiser tanks due to the poor performance of British light tanks during that battle </s>
<s> Due to the shortage of more suitable tanks light tanks that were not designed for use against German armour were nevertheless deployed against them the resulting high casualties led the War Office to re evaluate the suitability of the light tank design </s>
<s> The pre war role of the light tank that of reconnaissance meanwhile had been found to be better suited to scout cars that used smaller crews and had better cross country abilities </s>
<s> Further delays were caused by the bombing raids of the Luftwaffe during May against the factories where the tanks were assembled </s>
<s> The cumulative effect of these delays resulted in the production of only a small number of Mk unk estimates place the final total produced to be between and </s>
<s> The name unk was given to the Mk VII on September on the orders of the War Office </s>
<s> The last of the tanks were built in the first quarter of and delivered at the end of the year </s>
<s> Transfer to airborne role The War Office and the Army were concluding at this point that light tanks were a liability and too vulnerable for use in further combat and the unk was considered to be obsolete </s>
<s> This decision may have marked the end for the unk in active service several of the tanks destined to be deployed to the Eighth Army in the Middle East for the North African Campaign were left in Britain when their cooling systems were determined to be unable to cope with the intense North African heat </s>
<s> The demise of unk was prevented by a decision made by the War Office in mid as it was considering the equipment to be used by Britain s fledgling airborne forces formed in June under the orders of the Prime Minister Winston Churchill </s>
<s> When selecting the equipment for the airborne forces officials at the War Office concluded that gliders would be an integral component gliders would transport troops and heavy equipment which by was to include artillery and some form of tank </s>
<s> Plans to transport a tank went through a number of revisions but by May the feasibility of a </s>
<s> metric tons </s>
<s> long tons tank to be carried for miles km in a glider was accepted although the aircraft would have to be specifically designed for the task </s>
<s> In a conference held on January it was decided that the General Aircraft unk currently under development would be used to transport a single unk tank or two Universal unk </s>
<s> The unk was chosen because it was an obsolete design and was therefore available to be used by the airborne forces </s>
<s> Beginning in January training exercises were conducted carrying the unk and their crews inside unk gliders </s>
<s> These exercises were successful during the training by C Squadron of the unk Pilot Regiment which specialised in flying the unk over unk were made with an average of unk per crew </s>
<s> Only three incidents resulted in fatalities or injuries with seven pilots killed during the training </s>
<s> When the unk was re designated as an airborne tank several changes were made to its design </s>
<s> A number of tanks had their pounder guns replaced with a </s>
<s> millimetre </s>
<s> in infantry support howitzer these tanks were then designated as unk unk Close Support </s>
<s> Additionally unk unk were added to those unk which still possessed their pounders to increase their muzzle velocity and armour penetration </s>
<s> The unk experienced several setbacks throughout its development and deployment with the Army and airborne forces </s>
<s> One of the major problems was the limited number of these tanks that existed after production ended in which particularly affected the airborne forces </s>
<s> The transport of of the tanks to the USSR under the unk unk Act depleted the number available for use by airborne forces as did the loss of several more during Operation unk the invasion of Madagascar </s>

<s> This lack of sufficient replacement reserves combined with a War Office report that some unk airborne tanks would be required for the Airborne Division and an unnamed airborne division to be formed in India led to the unk s eventual replacement by the US unk unk </s>
<s> Performance A number of design faults of the unk were revealed through its operational use </s>
<s> Its size limited the possible crew to three a driver in the hull and a gunner and commander in the turret resulting in too few crew members to operate the unk effectively </s>
<s> The gunner or commander in addition to his own duties had to act as unk for the pounder which caused delays in combat </s>
<s> A report on the tank written in January stated that as the commander had to both fight and control the tank controlling a troop of unk during combat would be almost impossible </s>
<s> Problems were also found with the unk unk fitted to the pounder to increase its range and penetration power after they had been fitted the unk could not be removed and could only fire specially designed armour piercing rounds which took time to manufacture </s>
<s> The War Office also considered the unk s cooling system faulty making the tank unsuitable for service in unk climates such as the Middle East and North Africa </s>
<s> Operational history unk lease The first unk were delivered to the Army in November and were initially deployed with the Armoured Division which was being refitted after losing the majority of its previous tanks during the Battle of France and the newly formed Armoured Division </s>

<s> The unk of the unk s armour was found to be a problem and one which could not be solved as the weight of extra armour plating caused an unacceptable reduction in the tank s speed </s>
<s> Despite these drawbacks in the unk s design Soviet authorities believed it to be comparable to the T light tank in use at the time and decided that it was suitable to be used in combat </s>

<s> unk There were several variants of the unk design </s>

<s> The Mark VIII was also known as the Harry Hopkins named after President Roosevelt s chief diplomatic advisor and was given the General Staff design number unk by the War Office </s>
<s> The Mark VIII was intended to improve upon the design of the unk in a number of areas </s>

<s> in and the side armour to millimetres </s>
<s> in and the turret and hull given more sloped surfaces to help unk shells fired at the tank </s>
<s> The dimensions of the unk were also changed the Mark VIII was longer by inches </s>
<s> m wider by foot inches </s>
<s> m and heavier </s>
<s> The new tank was no longer air portable as it was too heavy to be carried by a unk </s>
<s> The cylinder engine of the unk was fitted to the Mark VIII although the increased weight meant that its maximum speed decreased to miles per hour km h its armament also remained the same as that of the unk </s>

<s> These problems continued to persist into when the War Office decided against using the tank in active service approximately Mark unk were produced by when production ended </s>
<s> A second variant on the unk design was the unk unk Drive unk DD </s>
<s> The unk Drive system was invented by Nicholas unk and was designed to allow a tank to swim through water and participate in amphibious operations </s>
<s> The system functioned by unk a large unk canvas screen around the tank above its tracks which was supported by thirty six unk tubes and steel struts this gave the tank sufficient unk to float and was then propelled along by a small propeller powered by the tank s engine </s>
<s> The screen could be collapsed by using a small explosive charge once the tank reached land </s>
<s> The system was fitted during June as the unk was the lightest light tank available at the time the converted tank was successfully tested on a number of lakes and reservoirs allowing the unk Drive system to be tested on heavier tanks such as the Valentine </s>
<s> The system would be used during Operation unk when Sherman medium tanks would land on the invasion beaches </s>

<s> unk colossal heads The unk colossal heads are at least seventeen monumental stone representations of human heads sculpted from large basalt boulders </s>
<s> The heads date from at least before BC and are a distinctive feature of the unk civilization of ancient unk </s>
<s> All portray mature men with unk unk flat unk and slightly crossed eyes their physical characteristics correspond to a type that is still common among the inhabitants of unk and Veracruz </s>
<s> The backs of the monuments often are flat </s>
<s> The boulders were brought from the Sierra de los unk mountains of Veracruz </s>
<s> Given that the extremely large slabs of stone used in their production were transported over large distances requiring a great deal of human effort and resources it is thought that the monuments represent portraits of powerful individual unk rulers </s>
<s> Each of the known examples has a distinctive headdress </s>
<s> The heads were variously arranged in lines or groups at major unk centres but the method and logistics used to transport the stone to these sites remain unclear </s>
<s> The discovery of a colossal head at unk unk in the nineteenth century spurred the first archaeological investigations of unk culture by Matthew unk in </s>
<s> Seventeen confirmed examples are known from four sites within the unk unk on the Gulf Coast of Mexico </s>
<s> Most colossal heads were sculpted from spherical boulders but two from San Lorenzo unk were re carved from massive stone unk </s>
<s> An additional monument at unk unk in Guatemala is a throne that may have been carved from a colossal head </s>
<s> This is the only known example from outside the unk unk </s>
<s> unk the monuments remains difficult because of the movement of many from their original contexts prior to archaeological investigation </s>
<s> Most have been dated to the Early unk period BC with some to the Middle unk BC period </s>
<s> The smallest weigh tons while the largest is variously estimated to weigh to tons although it was abandoned and left unfinished close to the source of its stone </s>
<s> unk civilization The unk civilization developed in the lowlands of southeastern Mexico between and BC </s>
<s> The unk unk lies on the Gulf Coast of Mexico within the states of Veracruz and unk an area measuring approximately kilometres mi east to west and extending about kilometres mi inland from the coast </s>
<s> The unk are regarded as the first civilization to develop in unk and the unk unk is one of six unk of civilization worldwide the others being the unk unk culture of South America the unk culture of China s Yellow River the Indus Valley Civilization of south Asia the civilization of ancient Egypt and the unk civilization of ancient Iraq </s>
<s> Of these only the unk civilization developed in a lowland tropical forest setting </s>
<s> The unk were the first inhabitants of the Americas to construct monumental architecture and to settle in towns and cities </s>
<s> They were also the first people in the Americas to develop a sophisticated style of stone sculpture </s>
<s> In the first decade of the century evidence emerged of unk writing with the earliest examples of unk hieroglyphs dating to around BC </s>
<s> Examples of script have been found on roller stamps and stone artefacts the texts are short and have been partially unk based on their similarity to other unk scripts </s>
<s> The evidence of complex society developing in the unk unk has led to the unk being regarded as the Mother Culture of unk although this concept remains controversial </s>
<s> Some of the unk rulers seem to have served religious functions </s>
<s> The city of San Lorenzo was succeeded as the main centre of the civilization by La unk in about BC with unk unk and unk de los unk possibly sharing the role other urban centres were much less significant </s>
<s> The nature and degree of the control exercised by the centres over a widespread rural population remains unclear </s>
<s> Very fine unk art much clearly made for an elite survives in several forms notably unk figurines and larger sculptures such as The unk </s>
<s> The figurines have been recovered in large numbers and are mostly in pottery these were presumably widely available to the population </s>
<s> Together with these of particular relevance to the colossal heads are the unk style masks in stone so called because none have yet been excavated in circumstances that allow the proper archaeological identification of an unk context </s>
<s> These evocative stone face masks present both similarities and differences to the colossal heads </s>
<s> Two thirds of unk monumental sculpture represents the human form and the colossal heads fall within this major theme of unk art </s>
<s> unk The colossal heads cannot be precisely dated </s>
<s> However the San Lorenzo heads were buried by BC indicating that their period of manufacture and use was earlier still </s>
<s> The heads from unk unk had been moved from their original context before they were investigated by archaeologists and the heads from La unk were found partially exposed on the modern ground surface </s>
<s> The period of production of the colossal heads is therefore unknown as is whether it spanned a century or a millennium </s>
<s> Estimates of the time span during which colossal heads were produced vary from to years </s>
<s> The San Lorenzo heads are believed to be the oldest and are the most unk executed </s>
<s> All of the stone heads have been assigned to the unk period of unk chronology generally to the Early unk BC although the two unk unk heads and the La unk Head are attributed to the Middle unk BC </s>
<s> Characteristics unk colossal heads vary in height from </s>
<s> to </s>
<s> metres </s>
<s> to </s>
<s> ft and weigh between and tons </s>
<s> All of the unk colossal heads depict mature men with flat unk and unk unk the eyes tend to be slightly crossed </s>
<s> The general physical characteristics of the heads are of a type that is still common among people in the unk region in modern times </s>
<s> The backs of the heads are often flat as if the monuments were originally placed against a wall </s>
<s> All examples of unk colossal heads wear distinctive unk that probably represent cloth or animal hide originals </s>
<s> Some examples have a tied knot at the back of the head and some are decorated with feathers </s>
<s> A head from La unk is decorated with the head of a bird </s>
<s> There are similarities between the unk on some of the heads that has led to speculation that specific unk may represent different dynasties or perhaps identify specific rulers </s>
<s> Most of the heads wear large unk inserted into the ear lobes </s>
<s> All of the heads are realistic unk and unk descriptions of the men </s>
<s> It is likely that they were portraits of living or recently deceased rulers well known to the unk </s>
<s> Each head is distinct and unk displaying unk features </s>
<s> They were once thought to represent unk although this theory is no longer widely held it is possible however that they represent rulers equipped for the unk unk </s>
<s> unk expressions depicted on the heads vary from stern through placid to smiling </s>
<s> The most unk unk art is the earliest appearing suddenly without surviving unk with a tendency towards more stylised sculpture as time progressed </s>
<s> Some surviving examples of wooden sculpture recovered from El unk demonstrate that the unk are likely to have created many more unk sculptures than works sculpted from stone </s>
<s> In the late nineteenth century Jos unk y Serrano described a colossal head as having Ethiopian features and speculations that the unk had African origins resurfaced in in the work of Alfonso unk unk and in the in the writings of Ivan van unk </s>
<s> Such speculation is not taken seriously by unk scholars such as Richard unk and Ann unk </s>
<s> Although all the colossal heads are broadly similar there are distinct stylistic differences in their execution </s>
<s> One of the heads from San Lorenzo bears traces of plaster and red paint suggesting that the heads were originally brightly decorated </s>
<s> Heads did not just represent individual unk rulers they also incorporated the very concept of rulership itself </s>
<s> unk The production of each colossal head must have been carefully planned given the effort required to ensure the necessary resources were available it seems likely that only the more powerful unk rulers were able to unk such resources </s>
<s> The workforce would have included unk labourers unk unk unk and other unk producing the tools to make and move the monument in addition to the support needed to feed and otherwise attend to these workers </s>
<s> The seasonal and agricultural cycles and river levels needed to have been taken into account to plan the production of the monument and the whole project may well have taken years from beginning to end </s>
<s> Archaeological investigation of unk basalt workshops suggest that the colossal heads were first roughly shaped using direct percussion to chip away both large and small unk of stone </s>
<s> The sculpture was then refined by unk the surface using unk which were generally rounded unk that could be of the same basalt as the monument itself although this was not always the case </s>
<s> unk were found in association with workshops at San Lorenzo indicating their use in the finishing of fine detail </s>
<s> unk colossal heads were fashioned as in the round monuments with varying levels of relief on the same work they tended to feature higher relief on the face and lower relief on the unk and unk </s>
<s> Monument at San Lorenzo is an extensively damaged throne with a figure emerging from a niche </s>
<s> Its sides were broken away and it was dragged to another location before being abandoned </s>
<s> It is possible that this damage was caused by the initial stages of re carving the monument into a colossal head but that the work was never completed </s>
<s> All seventeen of the confirmed heads in the unk unk were sculpted from basalt mined in the Sierra de los unk mountains of Veracruz </s>
<s> Most were formed from coarse unk dark grey basalt known as unk unk basalt after a volcano in the range </s>
<s> unk have proposed that large unk unk basalt boulders found on the southeastern slopes of the mountains are the source of the stone for the monuments </s>
<s> These boulders are found in an area affected by large unk volcanic mudslides that carried substantial blocks of stone down the mountain slopes which suggests that the unk did not need to quarry the raw material for unk the heads </s>
<s> Roughly spherical boulders were carefully selected to mimic the shape of a human head </s>
<s> The stone for the San Lorenzo and La unk heads was transported a considerable distance from the source </s>
<s> The La unk head was found on El unk hill in the Sierra de los unk and the stone from unk unk unk Head and unk unk Head also known as unk unk Monuments A and Q came from the same hill </s>
<s> The boulders were transported over kilometres mi from the source of the stone </s>
<s> The exact method of transportation of such large masses of rock are unknown especially since the unk lacked unk of burden and functional wheels and they were likely to have used water transport whenever possible </s>
<s> Coastal currents of the Gulf of Mexico and in river estuaries might have made the unk transport of monuments weighing tons or more impractical </s>
<s> Two badly damaged unk sculptures depict rectangular stone blocks bound with ropes </s>
<s> A largely destroyed human figure rides upon each block with their legs hanging over the side </s>
<s> These sculptures may well depict unk rulers overseeing the transport of the stone that would be fashioned into their monuments </s>
<s> When transport over land was necessary the unk are likely to have used unk ramps and roads to facilitate moving the heads </s>
<s> The regional terrain offers significant obstacles such as swamps and floodplains avoiding these would have necessitated crossing undulating hill country </s>
<s> The construction of temporary unk using the suitable and plentiful floodplain soils would have allowed a direct route across the floodplains to the San Lorenzo Plateau </s>
<s> Earth structures such as mounds platforms and unk upon the plateau demonstrate that the unk possessed the necessary knowledge and could commit the resources to build large scale earthworks </s>
<s> The flat backs of many of the colossal heads represented the flat bases of the monumental unk from which they were reworked </s>
<s> Only four of the seventeen unk heads do not have flattened backs indicating the possibility that the majority were reworked monuments </s>
<s> Alternatively the backs of many of these massive monuments may have been flattened to ease their transport providing a stable form for unk the monuments with ropes </s>
<s> Two heads from San Lorenzo have traces of niches that are characteristic of monumental unk unk and so were definitely reworked from earlier monuments </s>

<s> Brad Stevens Bradley Kent Brad Stevens born October is an American professional basketball head coach for the Boston Celtics of the NBA </s>

<s> Coaching style According to Stevens in one of his first games as head coach he was nervous and felt like our team played on edge because of it </s>

<s> Head coaching record College NBA Awards and nominations Henry unk Coach of the Year Award unk Horizon League Coach of the Year Hugh Durham Award for Mid major Coach of the Year unk Hugh Durham Award Mid season honors Jim unk National Coach of the Year Award unk unk Prosser Man of the Year Award unk unk crater unk is an impact crater that lies at the south pole of the Moon </s>
<s> The peaks along the crater s rim are exposed to almost continual sunlight while the interior is unk in shadow a unk of eternal darkness </s>
<s> The low temperature interior of this crater functions as a cold trap that may capture and freeze unk shed during comet impacts on the Moon </s>
<s> Measurements by the unk unk spacecraft showed higher than normal amounts of hydrogen within the crater which may indicate the presence of water ice </s>
<s> The crater is named after Antarctic explorer Ernest unk </s>
<s> Description The rotational axis of the Moon lies within unk only a few kilometers from its center </s>
<s> The crater is km in diameter and </s>
<s> km deep </s>
<s> From the Earth it is viewed edge on in a region of rough unk terrain </s>
<s> It is located within the South Pole unk basin on a unk </s>
<s> The rim is slightly raised about the surrounding surface and it has an outer rampart that has been only lightly impacted </s>
<s> No significant craters intersect the rim and it is sloped about </s>
<s> toward the direction from the Earth </s>
<s> The age of the crater is about </s>
<s> billion years and it has been in the proximity of the south lunar pole for at least the last two billion years </s>
<s> Because the orbit of the Moon is unk only from the ecliptic the interior of this crater lies in perpetual darkness </s>
<s> Estimates of the area in permanent shadow were obtained from Earth based radar studies </s>
<s> unk along the rim of the crater are almost continually illuminated by sunlight spending about of each lunar orbit exposed to the Sun </s>
<s> unk illuminated mountains have been termed peaks of eternal light and have been predicted to exist since the </s>
<s> The shadowed portion of the crater was unk with the unk Camera of the Japanese unk spacecraft using the illumination of sunlight reflected off the rim </s>
<s> The interior of the crater consists of a symmetrical slope that leads down to a </s>
<s> km diameter floor </s>
<s> The handful of craters along the interior span no more than a few hundred meters </s>
<s> The bottom is covered by an uneven mound like feature that is to m thick </s>
<s> The central peak is about m in height </s>
<s> The continuous shadows in the south polar craters cause the floors of these formations to maintain a temperature that never exceeds about K For unk the average temperature was determined to be about K reaching K at the crater floor </s>
<s> Under these conditions the estimated rate of loss from any ice in the interior would be to m s Any water vapor that arrives here following a unk impact on the Moon would lie permanently frozen on or below the surface </s>
<s> However the surface albedo of the crater floor matches the lunar far side suggesting that there is no exposed surface ice </s>
<s> This crater was named after Ernest Henry unk an Anglo Irish explorer of Antarctica from until his death in </s>
<s> The name was officially adopted by the International Astronomical Union in </s>
<s> Nearby craters of note include Shoemaker unk de unk unk and unk </s>
<s> unk farther away on the eastern hemisphere of the lunar near side are the larger craters unk and Scott named after two other early explorers of the Antarctic continent </s>
<s> Exploration From the perspective of the Earth this crater lies along the southern limb of the Moon making observation difficult </s>
<s> Detailed mapping of the polar regions and unk of the Moon did not occur until the advent of orbiting spacecraft </s>
<s> unk lies entirely within the rim of the immense South Pole unk basin which is one of the largest known impact formations in the Solar System </s>
<s> This basin is over kilometers deep and an exploration of its properties could provide useful information about the lunar interior </s>
<s> A neutron unk on board the unk unk spacecraft detected enhanced concentrations of hydrogen close to the northern and southern lunar poles including the crater unk </s>
<s> At the end of this mission in July the spacecraft was crashed into the nearby crater Shoemaker in the hope of detecting from Earth based telescopes an impact generated plume containing water vapor </s>
<s> The impact event did not produce any detectable water vapor and this may be an indication that the hydrogen is not in the form of hydrated minerals or that the impact site did not contain any ice </s>
<s> Alternatively it is possible that the crash did not excavate deeply enough into the unk to liberate significant quantities of water vapor </s>
<s> From Earth based radar and spacecraft images of the crater edge unk appears to be relatively intact much like a young crater that has not been significantly eroded from subsequent impacts </s>
<s> This may mean that the inner sides are relatively steep which may make traversing the sides relatively difficult for a robotic vehicle </s>
<s> In addition it is possible that the interior floor might not have collected a significant quantity of unk since its formation </s>
<s> However other craters in the vicinity are considerably older and may contain significant deposits of hydrogen possibly in the form of water ice </s>
<s> See Shoemaker lunar crater for example </s>
<s> Radar studies preceding and following the unk unk mission demonstrate that the inner walls of unk are similar in reflective characteristics to those of some unk craters </s>
<s> In particular the surroundings appear to contain a significant number of blocks in its unk blanket suggesting that its radar properties are a result of surface unk and not ice deposits as was previously suggested from a radar experiment involving the unk mission </s>
<s> This interpretation however is not universally agreed upon within the scientific community </s>
<s> Radar images of the crater at a wavelength of cm show no evidence for water ice deposits </s>
<s> Optical imaging inside the crater was done for the first time by the Japanese lunar unk spacecraft unk in </s>
<s> It did not have any evidence of significant amount of water ice down to the image resolution of m per pixel </s>
<s> On November a kg probe made a hard landing near the crater </s>
<s> The moon impact probe unk was launched from the Indian unk I spacecraft and reached the surface minutes later </s>
<s> The probe carried a radar unk video imaging system and a mass unk which will be used to search for water </s>
<s> Potential uses Some sites along unk s rim receive almost constant illumination </s>
<s> At these unk sunlight is almost always available for conversion into electricity using solar panels potentially making them good locations for future Moon landings </s>
<s> The temperature at this site is also more favorable than at more equatorial latitudes as it does not experience the daily temperature extremes of C when the Sun is overhead to as low as C during the lunar night </s>
<s> While scientific experiments performed by unk and unk unk could indicate the presence of water in the polar craters the current evidence is far from definitive </s>
<s> There are doubts among scientists as to whether or not the hydrogen is in the form of ice as well as to the concentration of this ore with depth below the surface </s>
<s> Resolution of this issue will require future missions to the Moon </s>
<s> The presence of water suggests that the crater floor could potentially be mined for deposits of hydrogen in water form a commodity that is expensive to deliver directly from the Earth </s>
<s> This crater has also been proposed as a future site for a large infrared telescope </s>
<s> The low temperature of the crater floor makes it ideal for infrared observations and solar cells placed along the rim could provide near continuous power to the observatory </s>
<s> About kilometers from the crater lies the km tall unk Mountain a peak that is unk visible from the Earth and which could serve as a radio relay station when suitably equipped </s>
<s> NASA has named the rim of unk as a potential candidate for its lunar outpost slated to be up and running by unk and continuously staffed by a crew by unk </s>
<s> The location would promote self unk for lunar residents as perpetual sunlight on the south pole would provide energy for solar panels </s>
<s> Furthermore the shadowed polar regions are believed to contain the frozen water necessary for human consumption and could also be harvested for fuel manufacture </s>
<s> American Beauty film American Beauty is a American drama film directed by Sam unk and written by Alan Ball </s>
<s> Kevin Spacey stars as Lester unk a year old advertising executive who has a unk crisis when he becomes infatuated with his unk daughter s best friend Angela Mena unk </s>
<s> unk unk co stars as Lester s unk wife Carolyn and unk Birch plays their unk daughter Jane </s>
<s> Wes Bentley Chris Cooper and Allison unk also feature </s>
<s> The film is described by academics as a satire of American middle class notions of beauty and personal satisfaction analysis has focused on the film s unk of romantic and paternal love sexuality beauty unk self liberation and redemption </s>
<s> Ball began writing American Beauty as a play in the early partly inspired by the media circus around the Amy Fisher trial in </s>
<s> He unk the play after realizing the story would not work on stage </s>
<s> After several years as a television screenwriter Ball revived the idea in when attempting to break into the film industry </s>
<s> The modified script had a cynical outlook that was influenced by Ball s frustrating unk writing for several sitcoms </s>
<s> unk Dan unk and Bruce Cohen took American Beauty to DreamWorks the then fledgling film studio bought Ball s script for unk several other production bodies </s>
<s> DreamWorks financed the million production and served as its North American distributor </s>

<s> and unk unk was nevertheless only given the job after others were considered and several A list directors turned down the opportunity </s>
<s> Spacey was unk first choice for the role of Lester though DreamWorks had urged the director to consider better known actors similarly the studio suggested several actors for the role of Carolyn until unk offered the part to unk without DreamWorks knowledge </s>
<s> Principal photography took place between December and February on soundstages at the Warner Bros unk in Burbank California and on location in Los Angeles </s>
<s> unk dominant style was deliberate and composed he made extensive use of static shots and slow pans and unk to generate tension </s>
<s> unk Conrad Hall complemented unk style with peaceful shot compositions to contrast with the turbulent on screen events </s>
<s> During editing unk made several changes that gave the film a less cynical tone than the script </s>
<s> Released in North America on September American Beauty was positively received by critics and audiences it was the best reviewed American film of the year and grossed over unk million worldwide </s>
<s> Reviewers praised most aspects of the production with particular emphasis on unk Spacey and Ball criticism focused on the familiarity of the characters and setting </s>
<s> DreamWorks launched a major campaign to increase the film s chances of Academy Award success at the Academy Awards the following year the film won Best Picture Best Director Best Actor for Spacey Best Original Screenplay and Best unk </s>
<s> It was nominated for and won many other awards and honors mainly for the direction writing and acting </s>

<s> Themes and analysis Multiple interpretations Scholars and academics have offered many possible readings of American Beauty film critics are similarly divided not so much about the quality of the film as their interpretations of it </s>
<s> Described by many as about the meaning of life or the hollow existence of the American suburbs the film has defied categorization by even the filmmakers </s>
<s> unk is unk saying the script seemed to be about something different each time he read it a mystery story a unk journey through American unk a series of love stories it was about imprisonment loneliness and beauty </s>
<s> It was funny it was angry sad </s>
<s> The literary critic and author Wayne C unk concludes that the film unk any one interpretation American Beauty cannot be adequately summarized as here is a satire on what s wrong with American life that plays down the celebration of beauty </s>
<s> It is more tempting to unk it as a portrait of the beauty underlying American unk and unk but that plays down the scenes of cruelty and horror and Ball s disgust with our unk </s>
<s> It cannot be summarized with either Lester or Ricky s philosophical statements about what life is or how one should live </s>
<s> He argues that the problem of interpreting the film is tied with that of finding its center a controlling voice who unk all of the choices </s>
<s> He contends that in American Beauty s case it is neither unk nor Ball </s>
<s> unk considers the voice to be Ball s but even while the writer was strongly influential on set he often had to accept deviations from his vision particularly ones that transformed the cynical tone of his script into something more optimistic </s>
<s> With unk voices unk on the original author s unk says those who interpret American Beauty have forgotten to probe for the elusive center </s>
<s> According to unk the film s true controller is the creative energy that hundreds of people put into its production agreeing and unk inserting and cutting </s>
<s> unk and redemption unk called American Beauty a rite of passage film about imprisonment and escape from imprisonment </s>
<s> The unk of Lester s existence is established through his gray unk workplace and unk clothing </s>
<s> In these scenes he is often framed as if trapped reiterating rituals that hardly please him </s>
<s> He unk in the unk of his shower the shower stall evokes a jail cell and the shot is the first of many where Lester is confined behind bars or within frames such as when he is reflected behind columns of numbers on a computer monitor confined and nearly crossed out </s>
<s> The academic and author unk W unk argues that Lester s journey is the story s center </s>

<s> Changed by Ricky s attractive profound confidence Lester is convinced that Angela is unk and sees that he must question his unk unk unk suburban existence he takes a job at a fast food outlet which allows him to unk to a point when he could see his whole life ahead of him </s>

<s> unk and beauty Like other American films of such as Fight Club Bringing Out the Dead and Magnolia American Beauty instructs its audience to lead more meaningful lives </s>
<s> The film argues the case against conformity but does not deny that people need and want it even the gay characters just want to fit in </s>
<s> Jim and Jim the unk other neighbors are a satire of gay unk unk who invest in the unk unk that the film criticizes in heterosexual couples </s>
<s> The feminist academic and author unk R unk argues that American Beauty uses its art house unk to direct its message of unk primarily to the middle classes and that this approach is a clich of unk preoccupation the underlying premise being that the luxury of finding an individual self through denial and unk is always open to those wealthy enough to choose and unk enough to present themselves unk as a rebel </s>
<s> Professor Roy M unk argues that the film s thematic center is its direction to the audience to look closer </s>
<s> The opening combines an unfamiliar viewpoint of the unk neighborhood with Lester s narrated admission that he will soon die forcing audiences to consider their own mortality and the beauty around them </s>
<s> It also sets a series of mysteries unk asks from what place exactly and from what state of being is he telling this story </s>
<s> If he s already dead why unk with whatever it is he wishes to tell about his last year of being alive </s>
<s> There is also the question of how Lester has died or will die </s>
<s> unk believes the preceding scene Jane s discussion with Ricky about the possibility of his killing her father adds further mystery </s>
<s> Professor Ann C Hall unk she says by presenting an early resolution to the mystery the film allows the audience to put it aside to view the film and its philosophical issues </s>
<s> Through this examination of Lester s life unk and death American Beauty unk American middle class notions of meaning beauty and satisfaction </s>
<s> Even Lester s transformation only comes about because of the possibility of sex with Angela he therefore remains a willing devotee of the popular media s unk of unk male sexuality as a sensible route to personal unk </s>

<s> The unk are unaware that they are unk philosophically and devout consumers unk who expect the unk of American beauty to give them happiness </s>

<s> According to Patti unk colors are used symbolically throughout the film none more so than red which is an important thematic signature that drives the story and defines Lester s arc </s>
<s> First seen in drab colors that reflect his unk Lester surrounds himself with red as he unk his individuality </s>

<s> unk and repression unk argues that American Beauty defines its characters through their sexuality </s>
<s> Lester s attempts to relive his youth are a direct result of his lust for Angela and the state of his relationship with Carolyn is in part shown through their lack of sexual contact </s>

<s> With other turn of the millennium films such as Fight Club In the Company of Men American unk and Boys Don t unk American Beauty raises the broader widely explored issue of unk in crisis </s>
<s> Professor Vincent unk charges that in their reinforcement of unk against threats posed by war by unk and by feminist and unk challenges these films present a need to focus on and even to privilege aspects of unk deemed unk </s>
<s> Lester s transformation conveys that he and not the woman has borne the brunt of lack of being and he will not stand for being unk </s>

<s> unk says the film explicitly affirms the importance of upholding the prohibition against unk a recurring theme of Ball s work is his comparison of the unk against unk and homosexuality </s>

<s> Ball said The movie is in part about how homophobia is based in fear and repression and about what they can do </s>
<s> The film implies two unk unk desires Lester s pursuit of Angela is a manifestation of his lust for his own daughter while Col unk repression is exhibited through the almost unk discipline with which he controls Ricky </s>
