<s> unk and music American Beauty follows a traditional narrative structure only unk with the displaced opening scene of Jane and Ricky from the middle of the story </s>
<s> Although the plot spans one year the film is narrated by Lester at the moment of his death </s>
<s> Jacqueline unk says that the plot occupies no time or all time citing Lester s claim that life did not flash before his eyes but that it stretches on forever like an ocean of time </s>
<s> unk argues that a rhythm of repetition forms the core of the film s structure </s>
<s> For example two scenes have the unk sitting down to an evening meal shot from the same angle </s>
<s> Each image is broadly similar with minor differences in object placement and body language that reflect the changed dynamic brought on by Lester s new found assertiveness </s>
<s> Another example is the pair of scenes in which Jane and Ricky film each other </s>
<s> Ricky films Jane from his bedroom window as she removes her bra and the image is reversed later for a similarly unk and unk scene in which Jane films Ricky at a vulnerable moment </s>
<s> Lester s fantasies are emphasized by unk and repetitive motion shots unk uses double and triple unk in several sequences and the score alters to make the audience aware that it is entering a fantasy </s>
<s> One example is the unk scene Lester s first encounter with Angela </s>
<s> While the unk perform their half time routine to On Broadway Lester becomes increasingly unk on Angela </s>
<s> Time slows to represent his unk hypnosis and Lester begins to unk that Angela s performance is for him alone </s>
<s> On Broadway which provides a conventional unk to the unk action is replaced by discordant unk music that lacks melody or progression </s>
<s> This unk score is important to creating the narrative unk in the sequence it conveys a moment for Lester that is stretched to an indeterminate length </s>
<s> The effect is one that Stan Link unk to vertical time described by the composer and music theorist Jonathan Kramer as music that unk a single present stretched out into an enormous duration a potentially infinite now that nonetheless feels like an instant </s>
<s> The music is used like a visual cue so that Lester and the score are staring at Angela </s>
<s> The sequence ends with the sudden reintroduction of On Broadway and unk time </s>
<s> According to Drew Miller of unk the soundtrack gives unconscious voice to the characters unk and unk the subtext </s>
<s> The most obvious use of pop music accompanies and gives context to Lester s attempts to recapture his youth reminiscent of how the counterculture of the unk American repression through music and drugs Lester begins to smoke cannabis and listen to rock music </s>
<s> unk song choices progress through the history of American popular music </s>
<s> Miller argues that although some may be over familiar there is a unk element at work making good on the film s encouragement that viewers look closer </s>
<s> Toward the end of the film Thomas Newman s score features more prominently creating a disturbing tempo that matches the tension of the visuals </s>
<s> The exception is Don t Let It unk You Down which plays during Angela s seduction of Lester </s>
<s> At first appropriate its tone clashes as the seduction stops </s>
<s> The lyrics which speak of castles burning can be seen as a metaphor for Lester s view of Angela the unk fantasy driven exterior of the American Beauty as it burns away to reveal the timid small unk girl who like his wife has unk developed a false public self </s>
<s> Production Development In Alan Ball resolved to move into the film industry after several frustrating years writing for the television sitcoms Grace Under Fire and unk </s>
<s> He joined the United Talent Agency where his representative Andrew unk suggested he write a unk script to unk himself to the town as a screenwriter </s>
<s> Ball pitched three ideas to unk two conventional romantic comedies and American Beauty which he had originally conceived as a play in the early </s>
<s> Despite the story s lack of an easily unk concept unk selected American Beauty because he felt it was the one for which Ball had the most passion </s>
<s> While developing the script Ball created another television sitcom Oh unk Up </s>
<s> He channeled his anger and frustration at having to unk to network demands on that show and during his unk on Grace Under Fire and unk into writing American Beauty </s>
<s> Ball did not expect to sell the script believing it would act as more of a calling card but American Beauty drew interest from several production bodies </s>
<s> unk passed the script to several producers including Dan unk and Bruce Cohen who took it to DreamWorks </s>

<s> In an unusual move DreamWorks decided not to option the script instead in April the studio bought it outright for unk Fox unk Pictures October Films Metro Goldwyn Mayer and unk Entertainment </s>
<s> DreamWorks planned to make the film for million </s>

<s> Nevertheless the studio offered the film to Mike Nichols and Robert unk neither accepted </s>
<s> In the same year unk then a theater director revived the musical unk in New York with fellow director Rob Marshall </s>
<s> Beth unk of the Creative Artists Agency arranged meetings for unk with studio figures in Los Angeles to see if film direction was a possibility </s>
<s> unk came across American Beauty in a pile of eight scripts at unk s house and knew immediately that it was the one he wanted to make early in his career he had been inspired by how the film Paris Texas presented contemporary America as a mythic landscape and he saw the same theme in American Beauty as well as parallels with his own childhood </s>

<s> unk background also unk him because of the prominent role the playwright usually has in a theater production </s>

<s> Writing Ball was partly inspired by two encounters he had in the early </s>

<s> unk a comic book telling of the scandal he was struck by how quickly it had become unk </s>

<s> Filming Principal photography lasted about days from December to February </s>
<s> American Beauty was filmed on soundstages at the Warner Bros unk in Burbank California and at Hancock Park and unk in Los Angeles </s>
<s> The aerial shots at the beginning and end of the film were captured in unk California and many of the school scenes were shot at South High School in unk California several extras in the gym crowd were South High students </s>
<s> The film is set in an upper middle class neighborhood in an unidentified American town </s>
<s> Production designer unk unk likened the unk to unk Illinois but said it s not about a place it s about an unk </s>
<s> The milieu was pretty much unk USA unk mobile unk </s>
<s> The intent was for the setting to reflect the characters who are also unk </s>
<s> unk said All of them are very strained and their lives are unk </s>
<s> The unk household was designed as the reverse of the unk the former a pristine ideal but unk and lacking in inner balance leading to Carolyn s desire to at least give it the appearance of a perfect all American household the unk home is depicted in exaggerated darkness and symmetry </s>
<s> The production selected two adjacent properties on the Warner unk s unk Street for the unk and unk homes </s>
<s> The crew rebuilt the houses to incorporate false rooms that established lines of sight between Ricky and Jane s bedroom windows and between Ricky s bedroom and Lester s garage </s>
<s> The garage windows were designed specifically to obtain the crucial shot toward the end of the film in which Col unk watching from Ricky s bedroom mistakenly assumes that Lester is paying Ricky for sex </s>
<s> unk made sure to establish the line of sight early on in the film to make the audience feel a sense of familiarity with the shot </s>
<s> The house interiors were filmed on the unk on location and on soundstages when overhead shots were needed </s>
<s> The inside of the unk home was shot at a house close to Interstate and Sunset Boulevard in Los Angeles the inside of the unk home was shot in the city s Hancock Park neighborhood </s>
<s> Ricky s bedroom was designed to be cell like to suggest his unk personality while at the same time blending with the high tech equipment to reflect his unk side </s>
<s> The production deliberately unk the use of red as it was an important thematic signature elsewhere </s>
<s> The unk home uses cool blues while the unk is kept in a depressed military palette </s>
<s> unk dominating visual style was deliberate and composed with a unk design that provided a sparse almost surreal feeling a bright unk hard edged near unk like take on American unk unk constantly directed his set unk to empty the frame </s>
<s> He made Lester s fantasy scenes more fluid and graceful and unk made minimal use of unk feeling that stable shots generated more tension </s>
<s> For example when unk used a slow push in to the unk dinner table he held the shot because his training as a theater director taught him the importance of putting distance between the characters </s>
<s> He wanted to keep the tension in the scene so he only cut away when Jane left the table </s>
<s> unk did use a hand held camera for the scene in which Col unk beats Ricky </s>
<s> unk said the camera provided the scene with a unk off balance energy </s>
<s> He also went hand held for the unk of Ricky s unk footage </s>
<s> unk took a long time to get the quality of Ricky s footage to the level he wanted </s>
<s> For the plastic bag footage unk used wind machines to move the bag in the air </s>
<s> The scene took four takes two by the second unit did not satisfy unk so he shot the scene himself </s>
<s> He felt his first take lacked grace but for the last attempt he changed the location to the front of a brick wall and added leaves on the ground </s>
<s> unk was satisfied by the way the wall gave definition to the outline of the bag </s>
<s> unk avoided using close ups as he believed the technique was unk he also cited Spielberg s advice that he should imagine an audience unk at the bottom of the camera monitor to keep in mind that he was shooting for display on a foot m screen </s>
<s> Spielberg who visited the set a few times also advised unk not to worry about costs if he had a great idea toward the end of a long working day </s>
<s> unk said That happened three or four times and they are all in the movie </s>
<s> Despite Spielberg s support DreamWorks and unk fought constantly over the schedule and budget although the studio unk little with the film s content </s>
<s> Spacey unk and Hall worked for significantly less than their usual rates </s>
<s> American Beauty cost DreamWorks million to produce slightly above their projected sum </s>
<s> unk was so dissatisfied with his first three days filming that he obtained permission from DreamWorks to unk the scenes </s>
<s> He said I started with a wrong scene actually a comedy scene </s>
<s> And the actors played it way too big it was badly shot my fault badly composed my fault bad costumes my fault and everybody was doing what I was asking </s>
<s> It was all my fault </s>
<s> Aware that he was a novice unk drew on the experience of Hall I made a very conscious decision early on if I didn t understand something technically to say without embarrassment I don t understand what you re talking about please explain it </s>
<s> unk encouraged some improvisation for example when Lester unk in bed beside Carolyn the director asked Spacey to improvise several unk for the act in each take </s>
<s> unk said I wanted that not just because it was funny but because I didn t want it to seem unk </s>
<s> I wanted it to seem like he was unk it out of his mouth without thinking </s>
<s> Spacey is so in control I wanted him to break through </s>
<s> Spacey obliged eventually coming up with phrases but unk could not always keep a straight face which meant the scene had to be shot times </s>
<s> The production used small amounts of computer generated imagery </s>
<s> Most of the rose unk in Lester s fantasies were added in post production although some were real and had the wires holding them digitally removed </s>
<s> When Lester unk about Angela in a rose unk bath the steam was real save for in the overhead shot </s>
<s> To position the camera a hole had to be cut in the ceiling through which the steam escaped it was instead added digitally </s>
<s> Editing American Beauty was edited by Christopher unk and unk unk unk began in the position but had to leave halfway through post production because of a scheduling conflict with Me Myself and Irene in which Chris Cooper also starred </s>
<s> unk and an assistant edited the film for days between the appointments </s>
<s> unk realized during editing that the film was different from the one he had envisioned </s>
<s> He believed he had been making a much more whimsical unk film than what came together in the edit suite </s>
<s> Instead unk was drawn to the emotion and darkness he began to use the score and shots he had intended to unk to craft the film along these lines </s>
<s> In total he cut about minutes from his original edit </s>
<s> The opening included a dream in which Lester imagines himself flying above the town </s>
<s> unk spent two days filming Spacey against unk but removed the sequence as he believed it to be too whimsical like a unk brothers movie and therefore inappropriate for the tone he was trying to set </s>
<s> The opening in the final cut reused a scene from the middle of the film where Jane tells Ricky to kill her father </s>
<s> This scene was to be the revelation to the audience that the pair was not responsible for Lester s death as the way it was scored and acted made it clear that Jane s request was not serious </s>
<s> However in the portion he used in the opening and when the full scene plays out later unk used the score and a reaction shot of Ricky to leave a lingering ambiguity as to his guilt </s>
<s> The subsequent shot an aerial view of the neighborhood was originally intended as the plate shot for the unk effects in the dream sequence </s>
<s> unk spent more time unk the first minutes than the rest of the film taken together </s>
<s> He unk several versions of the opening the first edit included unk scenes in which Jane and Ricky are convicted of Lester s murder but unk unk these in the last week of editing because he felt they made the film lose its mystery and because they did not fit with the theme of redemption that had emerged during production </s>
<s> unk believed the trial drew focus away from the characters and turned the film into an episode of unk Blue </s>
<s> Instead he wanted the ending to be a poetic mixture of dream and memory and narrative resolution </s>
<s> When Ball first saw a completed edit it was a version with truncated versions of these scenes </s>
<s> He felt that they were so short that they didn t really register </s>
<s> unk and he argued but Ball was more accepting after unk cut the sequences completely Ball felt that without the scenes the film was more optimistic and had evolved into something that for all its darkness had a really romantic heart </s>
<s> unk Conrad Hall was not the first choice for director of photography unk believed he was too old and too experienced to want the job and he had been told that Hall was difficult to work with </s>
<s> Instead unk asked Fred unk who turned the job down because he did not like the script </s>
<s> Hall was recommended to unk by Tom Cruise because of Hall s work on Without unk which Cruise had executive produced </s>
<s> unk was directing Cruise s then wife Nicole Kidman in the play The Blue Room during unk on American Beauty and had already unk the whole film </s>
<s> Hall was involved for one month during unk his ideas for lighting the film began with his first reading of the script and further passes allowed him to refine his approach before meeting unk </s>
<s> Hall was initially concerned that audiences would not like the characters he only felt able to identify with them during cast rehearsals which gave him fresh ideas on his approach to the visuals </s>
<s> Hall s approach was to create peaceful compositions that evoked unk to contrast with the turbulent on screen events and allow audiences to take in the action </s>
<s> Hall and unk first discussed the intended mood of a scene but he was allowed to light the shot in any way he felt necessary </s>
<s> In most cases Hall first lit the scene s subject by painting in the blacks and whites before adding fill light which he reflected from unk or white card on the ceiling </s>
<s> This approach gave Hall more control over the shadows while keeping the fill light unk and the dark areas free of spill </s>
<s> Hall shot American Beauty in a </s>
<s> aspect ratio in the Super format using unk Vision unk unk mm film stock </s>
<s> He used Super partly because its larger scope allowed him to capture elements such as the corners of the unk filled pool in its overhead shot creating a frame around Angela within </s>
<s> He shot the whole film at the same T stop unk given his preference for shooting that wide Hall favored high speed stocks to allow for more subtle lighting effects </s>
<s> He used unk Platinum cameras with the company s unk series of prime and unk lenses </s>
<s> Hall employed unk Vision unk unk and unk unk stock for scenes with daylight effects </s>
<s> He had difficulty adjusting to unk s newly introduced Vision release print stock which combined with his contrast heavy lighting style created a look with too much contrast </s>
<s> Hall contacted unk who sent him a batch of unk that was lower in contrast </s>
<s> Hall used a inch unk Black unk filter for almost every scene which he said in unk may not have been the best choice as the optical steps required to blow Super up for its unk release print led to a slight amount of degradation therefore the unk from the filter was not required </s>
<s> When he saw the film in a theater Hall felt that the image was slightly unclear and that had he not used the filter the unk from the Super unk conversion would have generated an image closer to what he originally intended </s>
<s> A shot where Lester and Ricky share a cannabis joint behind a building came from a misunderstanding between Hall and unk </s>
<s> unk asked Hall to prepare the shot in his absence Hall assumed the characters would look for privacy so he placed them in a narrow passage between a truck and the building intending to light from the top of the truck </s>
<s> When unk returned he explained that the characters did not care if they were seen </s>
<s> He removed the truck and Hall had to rethink the lighting he lit it from the left with a large light crossing the actors and with a soft light behind the camera </s>
<s> Hall felt the consequent wide shot worked perfectly for the tone of the scene </s>
<s> Hall made sure to keep rain or the suggestion of it in every shot near the end of the film </s>
<s> In one shot during Lester s encounter with Angela at the unk home Hall created rain effects on the foreground cross lights in another he partly lit the pair through French windows to which he had added material to make the rain run slower intensifying the light although the strength of the outside light was unrealistic for a night scene Hall felt it justified because of the strong contrasts it produced </s>
<s> For the close ups when Lester and Angela move to the unk Hall tried to keep rain in the frame lighting through the window onto the ceiling behind Lester </s>
<s> He also used rain boxes to produce rain patterns where he wanted without lighting the entire room </s>
<s> Music Thomas Newman s score was recorded in Santa Monica California </s>
<s> He mainly used percussion instruments to create the mood and rhythm the inspiration for which was provided by unk </s>
<s> Newman favored pulse rhythm and color over melody making for a more unk score than he had previously created </s>
<s> He built each cue around small unk repeating phrases often the only variety through a thinning of the texture for eight bars </s>
<s> The percussion instruments included unk unk unk piano unk and unk also featured were guitars flute and world music instruments </s>
<s> Newman also used electronic music and on unk tracks employed more unorthodox methods such as tapping metal mixing bowls with a finger and using a unk mandolin </s>

<s> Christopher unk Christopher unk September March was a prominent Massachusetts lawyer unk politician and US diplomat </s>
<s> Born into a family divided by the American Revolution unk sided with the victorious unk established a successful law practice in Boston and built a fortune by purchasing Revolutionary government debts at a discount and receiving full value for them from the government </s>
<s> unk entered politics in serving briefly in the Massachusetts legislature before being appointed US District Attorney for Massachusetts </s>
<s> He was then appointed by President George Washington to a diplomatic commission dealing with maritime claims in Great Britain </s>
<s> He returned to Massachusetts in and unk state politics running unsuccessfully for governor several times before winning in </s>
<s> He served one term losing to Democratic Republican Elbridge Gerry in </s>
<s> He was appointed to the US Senate by Governor Caleb Strong in where he led opposition to the War of </s>
<s> unk invested his fortune in a variety of businesses including important infrastructure projects such as the Middlesex Canal and a bridge across the Charles River </s>
<s> He was a major unk in the early textile industry funding the Boston Manufacturing Company and the unk Manufacturing Company whose business established the city of Lowell Massachusetts </s>
<s> unk was involved in a variety of charitable causes and was a major benefactor of Harvard College where the first library was named in his honor </s>
<s> His palatial mansion in unk Massachusetts now known as unk Place is one of the finest extant examples of unk architecture and has been declared a National Historic Landmark </s>
<s> Early years Christopher unk was born in Boston on September one of many children of Frances and John unk a successful merchant and unk </s>
<s> He was the youngest of their three sons to survive to adulthood </s>
<s> He attended Boston Latin School and entered Harvard College at the young even for the time age of thirteen </s>
<s> At the outset of the American Revolutionary War and the Siege of Boston in Harvard s buildings were occupied by the Continental Army and unk temporarily continued his studies in Bradford until Harvard could resume operations in Concord </s>
<s> While at Harvard unk participated in a speaking club and formed significant lifelong friendships with Rufus King and John unk </s>
<s> unk graduated in and promptly enlisted in the Continental artillery regiment of his brother in law Thomas unk where he served as a clerk until </s>
<s> The unk family was divided by the war unk s father was a unk who left Boston when the British Army evacuated the city in March </s>
<s> unk was consequently called upon to support his mother and three sisters who remained in Boston </s>
<s> In unk successfully petitioned the state for the remaining family s share of his father s seized assets </s>
<s> Early legal career After his military service unk studied law with John Lowell and was admitted to the bar in after a comparatively brief tutelage </s>
<s> unk s law practice flourished in part because many unk lawyers had fled Massachusetts </s>
<s> unk s clients included unk seeking to recover some of their assets as well as London based British merchants with claims to pursue </s>
<s> His unk were generally well reasoned and he was seen as a successful trial lawyer </s>
<s> unk grew his fortune by investing carefully in revolutionary currency and bonds </s>
<s> The unk he purchased were paper that had been given to Continental Army soldiers in lieu of pay which they often sold at a steep discount </s>
<s> One batch of unk he purchased for instance cost him about but had a face value of </s>
<s> In he married Rebecca unk Payne daughter of a wealthy merchant maritime unk and director of the Bank of Massachusetts </s>
<s> The couple were known for their social unk and became prominent members of Boston society </s>
<s> In unk became concerned about a rise in anti lawyer sentiment in Massachusetts </s>
<s> unk over harsh policies pursued by Governor James unk unk into unk Rebellion which required militia action to crush in </s>
<s> unk was one of several high profile lawyers assigned to defend participants in the rebellion included in this group were Theodore unk Caleb Strong James Sullivan Levi Lincoln Sr and Thomas unk </s>
<s> Although many rebels were ultimately convicted a large number received amnesty </s>
<s> In unk was elected a delegate to the Massachusetts convention that ratified the United States Constitution </s>
<s> His election was contested because Boston where he lived was at the time more inclined toward state power </s>
<s> unk nonetheless was strongly unk urging support of the new Constitution </s>
<s> unk banker and speculator In unk was elected to the Massachusetts House of Representatives </s>
<s> He took a leading role in adopting the state s rules for actions required of it by the new federal constitution </s>
<s> By his proposal the legislature decided that presidential electors would be chosen by a joint session </s>
<s> He also proposed that the state House and Senate agree by separate votes on choices for the United States Senate a process that would significantly reduce popular input to the choice </s>
<s> His choice was ultimately rejected in favor of a process whereby the House selected a slate of candidates from which the Senate would choose one </s>
<s> In unk decided to stand for reelection but lost owing to strong anti nationalist fervor in Boston at the time </s>
<s> He managed to win a seat later when a special election was held after unk opened several seats </s>
<s> unk s financial speculations in the late unk significantly multiplied his wealth </s>
<s> In he and Andrew unk a Boston businessman who had retained unk for legal services entered into a secret agreement to purchase Continental unk with a face value of in a speculative bid that their value would rise </s>

<s> Free Derry Free Derry Irish unk unk was a self declared autonomous nationalist area of Derry Northern Ireland that existed between and </s>
<s> Its name was taken from a sign painted on a gable wall in the unk in January which read You are now entering Free Derry </s>
<s> The area which included the unk and unk neighbourhoods was secured by community activists for the first time on January following an incursion into the unk by members of the Royal Ulster Constabulary unk </s>
<s> Residents built barricades and carried clubs and similar arms to prevent the unk from entering </s>
<s> After six days the residents took down the barricades and unk patrols resumed but tensions remained high over the following months </s>
<s> Violence reached a peak on August culminating in the Battle of the unk a three day pitched battle between residents and the unk </s>
<s> On August units of the British Army were deployed at the edge of the unk and the unk were withdrawn </s>
<s> The Derry Citizens Defence Association unk declared their intention to hold the area against both the unk and the British Army until their demands were met </s>
<s> The British Army made no attempt to enter the area </s>
<s> The situation continued until October when following publication of the Hunt Report military police were allowed in </s>
<s> The Irish Republican Army IRA began to re arm and recruit after August </s>
<s> In December it split into the Official IRA and the Provisional IRA </s>
<s> Both were supported by the people of the Free Derry area </s>
<s> Meanwhile relations between the British Army and the nationalist community which were initially good deteriorated </s>
<s> In July there was a surge of recruitment into the IRA after two young men were shot and killed by British troops </s>
<s> The government introduced unk on August and in response barricades went up once more in the unk and unk </s>
<s> This time Free Derry was a no go area defended by armed members of both the Official and Provisional IRA </s>
<s> From within the area they launched attacks on the British Army and the unk began a bombing campaign in the city centre </s>
<s> As before unarmed unk manned the barricades and crime was dealt with by a voluntary body known as the Free Derry Police </s>
<s> Support for the IRA increased further after Bloody Sunday in January when thirteen unarmed men and boys were shot dead by the British Army s Parachute Regiment at a march in the unk a man was wounded and died months later </s>
<s> The support began to unk after the killing by the Official IRA of a local youth who was home on leave from the British Army </s>
<s> After a Provisional IRA ceasefire during which it entered talks with the British government broke down the British took the decision to move against the no go areas </s>
<s> Free Derry came to an end on July when thousands of British troops moved in with armoured cars and unk to occupy the area </s>
<s> Background Derry City lies near the border between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland </s>
<s> It has a majority nationalist population and nationalists won a majority of seats in the local elections </s>
<s> Despite this the Ulster Unionist Party controlled the local council unk Corporation from onwards </s>
<s> The unk maintained their majority firstly by manipulating the constituency boundaries unk so that the South Ward with a nationalist majority returned eight councillors while the much smaller North Ward and unk Ward with unionist unk returned twelve councillors between them unk by allowing only unk to vote in local elections rather than one man one vote so that a higher number of nationalists who did not own homes were disenfranchised and unk by denying houses to nationalists outside the South Ward constituency </s>
<s> The result was that there were about nationalist families and practically no unionists on the housing waiting list and that housing in the nationalist area was crowded and of a very poor condition </s>
<s> The South Ward comprised the unk unk unk Bishop Street and Foyle Road and it was this area that would become Free Derry </s>
<s> The Derry Housing Action Committee unk was formed in March by members of the Derry Branch of the Northern Ireland Labour Party and the James unk Republican Club including unk unk and unk unk </s>
<s> It disrupted a meeting of unk Corporation in March and in May blocked traffic by placing a caravan that was home to a family of four in the middle of the unk Road in the unk and staging a sit down protest at the opening of the second deck of the unk Bridge </s>
<s> After the meeting of unk Corporation was again disrupted in August unk unk telephoned the Northern Ireland Civil Rights Association unk and invited them to hold a march in Derry </s>
<s> The date chosen was October an unk committee was formed although in reality most of the organizing was done by unk and unk and the route was to take the unk inside the city walls where nationalists were traditionally not permitted to march </s>
<s> The Minister of Home Affairs William Craig made an order on October prohibiting the march on the grounds that the unk Boys of Derry were intending to hold a march on the same day </s>

<s> The police action caused outrage in the nationalist area of Derry and at a meeting four days later the Derry Citizens Action Committee unk was formed with John Hume as chairman and Ivan Cooper as vice chairman </s>
<s> The first barricades Another group formed as a result of the events of October was People s Democracy a group of students in Queen s University Belfast </s>
<s> They organised a march from Belfast to Derry in support of civil rights starting out with about forty young people on January </s>

<s> The police who were at the scene unk to the B unk as they prepared their ambush and then failed to protect the unk many of whom ran into the river and were unk with stones from the bank </s>
<s> Dozens of unk were taken to hospital </s>
<s> The remainder continued on to Derry where they were attacked once more on their way to unk Bridge before they finally reached Guildhall Square where they held a rally </s>
<s> unk broke out after the rally </s>

<s> In the early hours of the following morning January members of the unk charged into St unk s Wells and unk Road in the unk breaking windows and beating residents </s>
<s> In his report on the disturbances Lord Cameron remarked that for such conduct among members of a disciplined and well led force there can be no acceptable justification or excuse and added that its effect in unk unk and inspiring hostility towards the police was unk great </s>
<s> That afternoon over unk residents built barricades armed themselves with steel bars wooden clubs and unk and told the police that they would not be allowed into the area </s>
<s> unk chairman John Hume told a meeting of residents that they were to defend the area and no one was to come in </s>
<s> Groups of men wearing unk patrolled the streets in shifts </s>

<s> That corner which was a popular venue for meetings later became known as Free Derry Corner </s>
<s> On January the unk area was extended to include the unk another nationalist area on a hill overlooking the unk </s>
<s> A clandestine radio station calling itself Radio Free Derry began broadcasting to residents playing rebel songs and encouraging resistance </s>

<s> Despite all this the Irish Times reported that the infrastructure of revolutionary control in the area has not been developed beyond the maintenance of patrols </s>

<s> April Over the next three months there were violent clashes with local youths throwing stones at police </s>
<s> Violence came to a head on Saturday April after a planned march from unk Bridge to the city centre was banned </s>
<s> A protest in the city centre led to clashes with unk unionists in sympathy with the anti civil rights stance of Ian Paisley </s>

<s> August October The unk Boys parade is an annual celebration by unionists of the relief of the Siege of Derry in which began when thirteen young apprentice boys shut the city s gates against the army of King James </s>
<s> At that time the parade was held on August each year </s>
<s> Participants from across Northern Ireland and Britain marched along the city walls above the unk and were often openly hostile to the residents </s>

<s> The chairman was unk unk an Irish Republican Army IRA veteran the vice chairman was Paddy Doherty a popular local man sometimes known as Paddy unk and the secretary was unk White another leading republican and leader of the James unk Republican Club </s>

<s> Before they engaged however British troops were deployed at the scene carrying automatic rifles and sub machine guns </s>
<s> The unk and B unk withdrew and the troops took up positions outside the unk area </s>
<s> A unk that included unk unk met senior army officers and told them that the army would not be allowed in until certain demands were met including the unk of the unk the disbandment of the B unk and the abolition of unk the Parliament and Government of Northern Ireland </s>
<s> The officers agreed that neither troops nor police would enter the unk and unk districts </s>
<s> A peace corps was formed to maintain law and order </s>

<s> unk agreed </s>

<s> Following unk s visit some barricades were breached but the majority remained while the people awaited concrete evidence of reform </s>
<s> Still the army made no move to enter the area </s>
<s> Law and order was maintained by a peace corps volunteers organised by the unk to patrol the streets and man the barricades </s>
<s> There was very little crime </s>
<s> unk in the words of unk unk as often as not consisted of a stern lecture from unk unk on the need for solidarity within the area </s>

<s> IRA resurgence The Irish Republican Army IRA had been inactive militarily since the end of the Border Campaign in </s>
<s> It was low in both personnel and equipment Chief of Staff unk unk told unk unk and Paddy Doherty in August that he couldn t defend the unk </s>
<s> I haven t the men nor the guns to do it </s>
<s> During the the leadership of the republican movement had moved to the left </s>
<s> Its focus was on class struggle and its aim was to unite the Irish nationalist and unionist working classes in order to overthrow capitalism both British and Irish </s>
<s> Republican unk were formed in Northern Ireland where unk unk was proscribed </s>
<s> These clubs were involved in the formation of unk in </s>
<s> In Derry the James unk Republican Club worked closely with Labour Party radicals with whom they set up the Derry Housing Action Committee and Derry unk Action Committee </s>
<s> The Derry Citizens Defence Association was formed initially by unk who then invited other nationalists to join </s>
<s> Although there were tensions between the younger leaders like unk White and the older traditional unk such as unk unk both sides saw the unrest of as a chance to advance republican aims and the two shared the platform at the Easter Rising commemoration in April </s>
<s> The events of August in Derry and more particularly in Belfast where the IRA was unable to prevent loss of life or protect families burned out of their homes brought to a head the divisions that had already appeared within the movement between the radicals and the unk and led to a split in December into the Official IRA and the Provisional IRA </s>
<s> Initially both armies organised for defensive purposes only although the unk were planning towards an offensive campaign </s>
<s> In Derry there was far less hostility between the two organisations than elsewhere and unk commonly paid subscriptions to both </s>
<s> When unk were arrested after the Official s Easter parade in March Officials and unk unk their trial together </s>
<s> At the start the Officials attracted most of the younger members </s>
<s> Martin McGuinness who in August had helped defend the barricades initially joined the Officials but a few months later left to join the unk </s>
<s> Relations between the British Army and the residents had steadily decayed since the first appearance of troops in August </s>
<s> In September after clashes between nationalist and unionist crowds that led to the death of a Protestant man William King the British Army erected a peace ring to unk the nationalist population in the area they had previously controlled </s>
<s> Roads into the city centre were closed at night and people were prevented from walking on certain streets </s>
<s> Although some moderate nationalists accepted this as necessary there was anger among young people </s>
<s> unk between youths and troops became more frequent </s>
<s> The riot following the Officials Easter parade in March marked the first time that the army used unk squads who rushed into the unk wielding unk to make arrests </s>
<s> The unk squads soon became a common feature of army arrest operations </s>
<s> There was also a belief that they were arresting people at random sometimes days after the alleged offence and based on the identification of people that they had seen from a considerable distance </s>
<s> The unk were condemned as unk by unk who saw the riots as hampering attempts to resolve the situation </s>
<s> The Labour radicals and Official unk still working together tried to turn the youth away from rioting and create socialist organizations one such organization was named the Young unk Association but to no unk </s>
<s> The unk while unk of riots viewed them as the inevitable consequence of British occupation </s>
<s> This philosophy was more attractive to unk and some of them joined the Provisional IRA </s>
<s> The deaths of two leading unk in a premature explosion in June resulted in young militants becoming more prominent in the organization </s>
<s> Nevertheless up to July the Provisional IRA remained numerically small </s>
<s> Two men unk unk and Desmond Beattie were shot dead in separate incidents in the early morning and afternoon of July </s>
<s> They were the first people to be killed by the British Army in Derry </s>
<s> In both cases the British Army claimed that the men were attacking them with guns or bombs while unk insisted that both were unarmed </s>
<s> The Social Democratic and Labour Party unk the newly formed party of which John Hume and Ivan Cooper were leading members withdrew from unk in protest but among residents there was a perception that moderate policies had failed </s>
<s> The result was a surge of support for the IRA </s>
<s> The unk held a meeting the following Sunday at which they called on people to join the IRA </s>
<s> Following the meeting people unk up to join and there was large scale rioting </s>
<s> The British Army post at unk s Lane came under sustained attack and troops there and around the city came under fire from the IRA </s>
<s> unk and the third Free Derry The increasing violence in Derry and elsewhere led to increasing speculation that unk without trial would be introduced in Northern Ireland and on August hundreds of unk and nationalists were arrested in dawn raids </s>
<s> In Derry residents came out onto the streets to resist the arrests and fewer people were taken there than elsewhere nevertheless leading figures including unk unk and unk White were interned </s>
<s> In response barricades were erected once again and the third Free Derry came into existence </s>
<s> Unlike its predecessors this Free Derry was marked by a strong IRA presence both Official and Provisional </s>
<s> It was defended by armed unk a no go area one in which British security forces were unable to operate </s>
<s> Gun attacks on the British Army increased </s>
<s> Six soldiers were wounded in the first day after unk and shortly afterwards a soldier was killed the first to be killed by either IRA in Derry </s>
<s> The army moved in in force on August to unk the barricades </s>
<s> A gun battle ensued in which a young Provisional IRA officer unk unk was killed </s>
<s> A crowd staging a sit down protest was unk down and the protesters including John Hume and Ivan Cooper arrested </s>
<s> With barricades re appearing as quickly as they were removed the army eventually abandoned their attempt </s>
<s> The Derry unk had little contact with the IRA elsewhere </s>
<s> They had few weapons about twenty which they used mainly for sniping </s>
<s> At the same time they launched their bombing campaign in Derry </s>
<s> Unlike in Belfast they were careful to avoid killing or injuring innocent people </s>
<s> unk unk wrote that the Derry unk under Martin McGuinness had managed to bomb the city centre until it looked as if it had been hit from the air without causing any civilian casualties </s>
<s> Although both unk operated openly neither was in control of Free Derry </s>
<s> The barricades were manned by unarmed unk </s>
<s> Crime was dealt with by a volunteer force called the Free Derry Police which was headed by Tony O unk a Derry footballer and Northern Ireland International </s>
<s> Bloody Sunday An anti unk protest organised by the Northern Ireland Civil Rights Association unk at unk Camp in January was met with violence from the Battalion The Parachute Regiment unk </s>
<s> unk had organised a march from the unk to Derry city centre in defiance of a ban on the following Sunday January </s>
<s> Both unk were asked and agreed to suspend operations on that day to ensure the march passed off peacefully </s>
<s> The British Army erected barricades around the Free Derry area to prevent unk from reaching the city centre </s>
<s> On the day march organisers turned the march away from the barriers and up to Free Derry Corner but some youths proceeded to the barrier at William Street and unk soldiers </s>
<s> Troops from unk then moved into Free Derry and opened fire killing thirteen people all of whom were subsequently found to be unarmed </s>
<s> A fourteenth shooting victim died four months later in June </s>
<s> Like the killing of unk and Beattie the previous year Bloody Sunday had the effect of hugely increasing recruitment to the IRA even among people who previously would have been unk </s>
<s> February July Both the Provisional and Official IRA stepped up attacks after Bloody Sunday with the tacit support of the residents </s>
<s> Local feelings changed however with the killing of Ranger William Best by the Official IRA </s>
<s> Best was a year old local man who was home on leave from the British Army at his parents house in the unk </s>
<s> He was abducted interrogated and shot </s>
<s> The following day women marched to the Republican Club offices in protest </s>
<s> Nine days later on May the Official IRA declared a ceasefire </s>
<s> The Provisional IRA initially stated that they would not follow suit but after informal approaches to the British Government they announced a ceasefire from June </s>
<s> Martin McGuinness was the Derry representative in a party of senior unk who travelled to London for talks with William unk the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland </s>
<s> The talks were not resumed after the ending of the truce following a violent confrontation in Belfast when troops prevented Catholic families from taking over houses in the unk estate </s>
<s> Political pressure for the action against the no go areas increased after the events of Bloody Friday in Belfast </s>
<s> A British Army attack was considered inevitable and the IRA took the decision not to resist it </s>
<s> On July Operation unk was launched when thousands of British troops equipped with armoured cars and armoured unk AVREs dismantled the barricades and occupied the area </s>
<s> Subsequent history After Operation unk the British Army controlled the unk and unk by unk large numbers of troops within the area by conducting large scale search operations that were in fact undertaken for purposes of intelligence gathering and by setting up over a dozen covert observation posts </s>
<s> Over the following years IRA violence in the city was contained to the point where it was possible to believe the war was over in the area although there were still frequent street riots </s>
<s> Nationalists even those who did not support the IRA remained unk opposed to the army and to the state </s>
<s> Many of the residents original grievances were addressed with the passing of the Local Government Northern Ireland Act which unk the electoral boundaries and introduced universal adult suffrage based on the single unk vote </s>
<s> unk were held in May </s>
<s> Nationalists gained a majority on the council for the first time since </s>
<s> Since then the area has been extensively redeveloped with modern housing replacing the old houses and flats </s>
<s> The Free Derry era is commemorated by the Free Derry wall the murals of the unk Artists and the Museum of Free Derry </s>
<s> Come What ever May Come What ever May is the second studio album by American alternative metal band Stone unk </s>

<s> The work presents the view from Manhattan of the rest of the world showing Manhattan as the center of the world </s>
<s> View of the World has been parodied by Ted unk Columbia Pictures The New Yorker The Economist and Mad Magazine among others </s>
<s> The work has been imitated and printed without authorization in a variety of ways </s>
<s> The Columbia parody led to a ruling by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York in unk v Columbia Pictures Industries Inc in favor of unk because of copyright violations by Columbia Pictures </s>
<s> The work is regarded as one of the greatest magazine covers of recent generations and is studied by art students around the world </s>
<s> Background Saul unk created covers and unk internal drawings and illustrations for The New Yorker including its March cover titled View of the World from Avenue </s>
<s> This is regarded as his most famous work </s>
<s> It is considered an example of unintentional fame unk has noted that the type of fame that resulted from the work has diminished his significance to the man who did that poster </s>
<s> The work is sometimes referred to as A unk New Yorker s View of the World or A New Yorker s View of the World because it depicts a map of the world as seen by self absorbed New Yorkers </s>
<s> At one point The New Yorker applied for a copyright from the United States unk Office for the work </s>
<s> It assigned the copyright to unk and subsequently reproduced posters of the painting </s>
<s> unk The illustration is split in two parts with the bottom half of the image showing Manhattan s Avenue Avenue and the Hudson River appropriately labeled and the top half depicting the rest of the world </s>
<s> It is a westward view over Avenue </s>
<s> The rest of the United States is the size of the three New York City blocks and is drawn as a unk bounded by North American neighbors Canada and Mexico with a thin brown strip along the Hudson representing Jersey the names of five cities Los Angeles Washington DC Las Vegas Kansas City and Chicago and three states Texas Utah and Nebraska scattered among a few rocks for the United States beyond New Jersey which is in bolder font than the rest of the country beyond the Hudson </s>
<s> Washington DC is depicted as a remote location near Mexico </s>
<s> The Pacific Ocean slightly wider than the Hudson separates the United States from three flattened land masses labeled China Japan and Russia </s>
<s> Notably the image depicts the world with a back turned to Europe which is absent from the painting </s>
<s> The work is composed in ink pencil colored pencil and unk on paper and measures by inches cm cm </s>
<s> When exhibiting this work along with alternate versions and sketches the University of Pennsylvania summarized the work as a bird s eye view of the city from unk Avenue in a straight line westward with space becoming ever more unk They also described the work as a tongue in cheek view of the world </s>
<s> New York interpreted the New York centric mind s view of the rest of the world as a set of outer unk as iconic </s>
<s> National Post journalist Robert unk described the perspective as one in which the entire world is a suburb of Manhattan </s>
<s> unk View of the World has been imitated without authorization in a variety of ways </s>
<s> The work has been imitated in unk format by numerous municipalities states and nations </s>
<s> unk had stated that he could have retired on royalties from the many parodies made of the painting had they been paid a motivation for his eventual copyright lawsuit for the Moscow on the Hudson use </s>
<s> unk writing in The National Post noted that the metaphor of the world as a suburb of Manhattan was understood and borrowed by the whole world </s>
<s> Local artists especially poster artists presented similarly compelling depictions of their own provincial perceptions </s>
<s> unk demonstrated the prominence of this work by mentioning that a high school in suburban Ottawa made imitating View of the World an assignment in its graphic arts class </s>
<s> He also noted that the results of this assignment was a worldwide variety of global unk from which the students viewed the world </s>
<s> The illustration unk depicting New Yorkers self image of their place in the world or perhaps outsiders view of New Yorkers self image inspired many similar works including the poster for the film Moscow on the Hudson that movie poster led to a lawsuit unk v Columbia Pictures Industries Inc unk F unk </s>
<s> unk unk which held that Columbia Pictures violated the copyright unk held on his work </s>
<s> On June during the first term of George W Bush s presidency Ted unk presented A View of the World from Pennsylvania Avenue as a unk of View of the World from Avenue in a Universal Press Syndicate editorial cartoon </s>
<s> He replaced the letters representing The New Yorker with The unk </s>
<s> The cover was later unk by Barry Blitt for the cover of The New Yorker on October </s>

<s> Meteorological history On October an area of convection with a broad circulation persisted southeast of Guam and slowly consolidated due to moderate wind shear and unk outflow </s>
<s> That day the Japan Meteorological Agency JMA classified the system as a tropical depression about km mi to the southeast of unk Guam </s>
<s> At UTC on October the Philippine unk unk and Astronomical Services Administration PAGASA began issuing advisories on the depression giving it the local name unk </s>
<s> The next day the JMA upgraded the depression to Tropical Storm unk unk and the Joint Typhoon Warning Center JTWC also classified it as Tropical Depression unk </s>
<s> By that time the storm was moving steadily westward due to the subtropical ridge to the north </s>
<s> With the warm waters of the Philippine Sea unk wind shear and improving outflow unk gradually strengthened and the JTWC also upgraded unk to tropical storm status on October after an eye feature developed </s>
<s> While approaching northern Luzon on October unk quickly intensified as the initial eye feature organized into a well defined eye </s>
<s> Late on October the JTWC upgraded unk to typhoon status and the next day both PAGASA and JMA followed suit </s>
<s> On October unk made landfall in northeastern Luzon near Cagayan and developed a unk eyewall while initially moving over land </s>
<s> Land interaction weakened the eye by the time unk emerged into the South China Sea late on October </s>
<s> The next day PAGASA discontinued advisories after the typhoon exited the region </s>
<s> unk rebuilt around the center with continued favorable conditions allowing for unk </s>
<s> Late on November a large eye redeveloped and the JTWC estimated unk attained peak minute sustained winds of km h mph </s>
<s> Early the next day the JMA also estimated the typhoon reached peak minute winds of km h mph </s>
<s> Later increasing wind shear caused the eye to deteriorate and unk began slowing about km mi east southeast of Hong Kong after reaching the western edge of the subtropical ridge </s>
<s> After remaining nearly stationary unk began moving steadily to the west southwest due to a new ridge </s>
<s> The convection continued to weaken due to continued shear and cooler waters from unk and unk deteriorated to tropical storm status on November </s>
<s> The next day the JTWC issued its final advisory after the circulation became exposed from the convection </s>
<s> Also on November the JMA downgraded unk to tropical depression status off the northeast Vietnam coast </s>
<s> The system dissipated at UTC on November </s>

<s> Commonwealth War Graves Commission The Commonwealth War Graves Commission unk is an unk organisation of six independent member states whose principal function is to mark record and maintain the graves and places of commemoration of Commonwealth of Nations military service members who died in the two World Wars </s>
<s> The Commission is also responsible for commemorating Commonwealth civilians who died as a result of enemy action during World War II </s>
<s> The Commission was founded by unk Ware and constituted through Royal Charter in named the Imperial War Graves Commission </s>
<s> The change to the present name took place in </s>
<s> The Commission as part of its mandate is responsible for commemorating all Commonwealth war dead individually and equally </s>
<s> To this end the war dead are commemorated by name on a unk at an identified site of a burial or on a memorial </s>
<s> War dead are commemorated uniformly and equally irrespective of military or civil rank race or unk </s>
<s> The Commission is currently responsible for the continued commemoration of </s>
<s> million deceased Commonwealth military service members in countries </s>
<s> Since its inception the Commission has constructed approximately war unk and numerous memorials </s>
<s> The Commission is currently responsible for the care of war dead at over separate burial sites and the maintenance of more than memorials worldwide </s>
<s> In addition to commemorating Commonwealth military service members the Commission maintains under arrangement with applicable governments over non Commonwealth war graves and over non war military and civilian graves </s>
<s> The Commission operates through the continued financial support of the member states United Kingdom Canada Australia New Zealand India and South Africa </s>
<s> The current President of the Commonwealth War Graves Commission is Prince Edward Duke of Kent </s>
<s> History World War I On the outbreak of World War I in unk Ware a director of the Rio unk Company found that at years old he was too old to join the British Army </s>
<s> He used the influence of Rio unk chairman Viscount unk to become the commander of a mobile unit of the British Red Cross </s>
<s> He arrived in France in September and whilst there was struck by the lack of any official mechanism for documenting or marking the location of graves of those who had been killed and felt compelled to create an organisation within the Red Cross for this purpose </s>
<s> In March with the support of unk unk unk General of the British Expeditionary Force Ware s work was given official recognition and support by the Imperial War Office and the unit was transferred to the British Army as the Graves unk Commission </s>
<s> The new Graves unk Commission had over graves of British and Imperial soldiers registered by October and registered by May </s>
<s> When municipal unk began to unk Ware began negotiations with various local authorities to acquire land for further unk </s>
<s> Ware began with an agreement with France to build joint British and French unk under the understanding that these would be maintained by the French government </s>
<s> Ware eventually concluded that it was not unk to leave the maintenance responsibilities solely to the French government and subsequently arranged for France to purchase the land grant it in unk and leave the management and maintenance responsibilities to the British </s>
<s> The French government agreed under the condition that unk respected certain dimensions were accessible by public road were in the vicinity of medical aid stations and were not too close to towns or villages </s>
<s> Similar negotiations were started with the Belgian government </s>
<s> As reports of the grave registration work became public the Commission began to receive letters of enquiry and requests for photographs of graves from relatives of deceased soldiers </s>
<s> By photographs had been dispatched to relatives </s>
<s> In March the Commission with the support of the Red Cross began to dispatch photographic prints and cemetery location information in answer to the requests </s>
<s> The Graves unk Commission became the Directorate of Graves unk and unk in the spring of in recognition of the fact that the scope of work began to extend beyond simple grave registration and began to include responding to unk from relatives of those killed </s>
<s> The unk s work was also extended beyond the Western Front and into other theatres of war with units deployed in Greece Egypt and Mesopotamia </s>
<s> Formal establishment As the war continued Ware and others became concerned about the fate of the graves in the post war period </s>
<s> Following a suggestion by the British Army the National Committee for the Care of Soldiers Graves was appointed by the British government in January with Edward Prince of Wales agreeing to serve as president </s>
<s> The National Committee for the Care of Soldiers Graves was created with the intention of taking over the work of the Directorate of Graves unk and unk after the war </s>
<s> The government felt that it was more appropriate to unk the work to a specially appointed body rather than to any existing government department </s>
<s> By early a number of members of the committee believed a formal imperial organisation would be needed to care for the graves </s>
<s> With the help of Edward Prince of Wales Ware submitted a memorandum to the Imperial War Conference in suggesting that an imperial organisation be constituted </s>
<s> The suggestion was accepted and on May the Imperial War Graves Commission was established by Royal Charter with the Prince of Wales serving as president Secretary of State for War Lord Derby as chairman and Ware as vice chairman </s>
<s> The Commission s undertakings began in earnest at the end of the First World War </s>
<s> Once land for unk and memorials had been guaranteed the enormous task of recording the details of the dead could begin </s>
<s> By some unk graves had been identified and a further unk casualties were registered as having no known grave </s>
<s> The scale and associated high number of casualties of the war produced an entirely new attitude towards the commemoration of war dead </s>
<s> Previous to World War I individual commemoration of war dead was often on an ad hoc basis and was almost exclusively limited to commissioned officers </s>
<s> However the war required unk of a significant percentage of the population either as volunteers or through conscription </s>
<s> An expectation had consequently arisen that individual soldiers would expect to be commemorated even if they were low ranking members of the military </s>
<s> A committee under unk Kenyon Director of the British Museum presented a report to the Commission in November detailing how it envisioned the development of the unk </s>
<s> Two key elements of this report were that bodies should not be repatriated and that uniform memorials should be used to avoid class distinctions </s>
<s> Beyond the logistical nightmare of returning home so many corpses it was felt that repatriation would conflict with the feeling of unk that had developed between serving ranks </s>
<s> An article in The Times on February by unk Kipling carried the Commission s proposal to a wider audience and described what the graves would look like </s>
<s> The article entitled War Graves Work of Imperial Commission Mr Kipling s Survey was quickly republished as an illustrated booklet Graves of the Fallen </s>
<s> The illustrated booklet was intended to unk the impact of Kenyon s report as it included illustrations of unk with mature trees and shrubs contrasting the bleak landscapes depicted in published battlefield photos </s>
<s> There was an immediate public unk following the publication of the reports particularly with regards to the decision to not unk the bodies of the dead </s>
<s> The reports generated considerable discussion in the press which ultimately led to a heated debate in Parliament on May </s>
<s> Sir James unk started the debate followed by speeches by William unk unk in favour of the Commission s principles and Robert Cecil speaking for those unk repatriation and opposing unk of grave markers </s>
<s> Winston Churchill closed the debate and asked that the issue not proceed to a vote </s>
<s> unk withdrew his motion allowing the Commission to carry out its work assured of support for its principles </s>
<s> First unk and memorials to the missing Three of the most eminent architects of their day Sir Herbert Baker Sir Reginald unk and Sir Edwin unk were commissioned to design the unk and memorials </s>
<s> unk Kipling was appointed literary advisor for the language used for memorial inscriptions </s>
<s> In the Commission built three experimental unk at Le unk unk and unk following the principles outlined in the Kenyon report </s>
<s> Of these the unk Communal Cemetery and unk was agreed to be the most successful </s>
<s> Having consulted with garden designer Gertrude Jekyll the architects created a walled cemetery with uniform unk in a garden setting augmented by unk s Cross of unk and unk Stone of Remembrance </s>
<s> After some adjustments unk became the template for the Commission s building programme </s>
<s> unk were required because all three experimental unk went over budget </s>
<s> To ensure future unk remained within their budget the Commission decided to not build shelters in unk that contained less than graves to not place a Stone of Remembrance in any cemetery with less than graves and to limit the height of cemetery walls to metre </s>
<s> ft </s>
<s> At the end of the Commission had spent and this figure rose to in as construction of unk and memorials increased </s>
<s> By the Commission had established unk which were ready for unk unk and burials </s>
<s> Between and the Commission was shipping unk a week to France </s>
<s> In many cases small unk were closed and the graves concentrated in larger ones </s>
<s> By when the majority of construction had been completed over unk had been built with unk a thousand Crosses of unk and Stones of Remembrance </s>
<s> The Commission had also been mandated to individually commemorate each soldier who had no known grave which amounted to in France and Belgium alone </s>
<s> The Commission initially decided to build monuments on which to commemorate the missing each memorial being located at the site of an important battle along the Western Front </s>
<s> After resistance from the French committee responsible for the unk of memorials on French territory the Commission revised their plan and reduced the number of memorials and in some cases built memorials to the missing in existing unk rather than as separate structures </s>
<s> Reginald unk s unk Gate was the first memorial to the missing located in Europe to be completed and was unveiled on July </s>
<s> The unk Gate unk was found to have insufficient space to contain all the names as originally planned and unk names of the missing were instead inscribed on Herbert Baker s unk unk Memorial to the Missing </s>

<s> The programme of commemorating the dead of the Great War was considered essentially complete with the inauguration of the unk Memorial in though the unk Memorial would not be finished until the unk unk Memorial until and unk were still conducting work on the unk Gate when Germany invaded Belgium in </s>
<s> The only memorial created by the Commission that was not in the form of a monument or cemetery was the unk Institute at unk Egypt complete with library and unk and pathology departments as its memorial to men of the Egyptian Labour Corps and Camel Transport Corps </s>
<s> Its erection was agreed with local political pressure </s>
<s> World War II From the start of the Second World War in the Commission organised grave registration units and planning ahead based on the experience gained from the First World War earmarked land for use as unk </s>
<s> When the war began turning in favour of the Allies the Commission was able to begin restoring its First World War unk and memorials </s>
<s> It also began the task of commemorating the Commonwealth casualties from the Second World War </s>
<s> In the Commission completed unk Canadian War Cemetery the first of unk new unk and new memorials </s>
<s> Eventually over new unk were erected </s>
<s> Many were made from unk Wood stone </s>
<s> The wider scale of World War II coupled with manpower shortages and unrest in some countries meant that the construction and restoration programmes took much longer </s>
<s> Following the war the Commission implemented a five year unk renovation programme </s>
<s> The unk neglect was largely addressed by but there were necessary structural repairs to be made </s>
<s> These together with the unk of maintenance tasks from before the war took a further years to complete and the programme was not completed until the </s>
<s> With the increased number of civilian casualties compared with the World War I Winston Churchill agreed to Ware s proposal that the Commission also maintain a record of Commonwealth civilian war deaths </s>
<s> A supplemental chapter was added to the Imperial War Graves Commission s charter on February unk the organisation to collect and record the names of civilians who died from enemy action during the Second World War which resulted in the creation of the Civilian War Dead Roll of Honour </s>
<s> The roll eventually contained the names of nearly civilians </s>
<s> The Commission and the Dean of Westminster reached an agreement that the roll would eventually be placed in Westminster Abbey but not until the roll was complete and hostilities had ended </s>
<s> The Commission handed over the first six volumes to the Dean of Westminster on February the final volume was added to the showcase in </s>
<s> Post World War II Following World War II the Commission recognised that the word Imperial within its name was no longer appropriate </s>
<s> In the spirit of strengthening national and regional feelings the organisation s name was changed to Commonwealth War Graves Commission in </s>
<s> More recent conflicts have sometimes made it impossible for the Commission to care for unk in a given region or resulted in the destruction of sites altogether </s>
<s> unk Indian Cemetery in Germany was unk after the end of World War II and until the German unk because it was located in an area occupied by Russian forces and was not entirely rebuilt until </s>
<s> The Six Day War and War of unk resulted in the destruction of Port unk Memorial and Aden Memorial and the death of a Commission unk at Suez War Memorial Cemetery </s>
<s> During the Lebanese Civil War two unk in Beirut were destroyed and had to be rebuilt </s>
<s> The maintenance of war graves and memorials in Iraq has remained difficult since Iran Iraq War in the with regular maintenance being impractical since after the Gulf War </s>
<s> The Commission has and continues to also provide support for war graves outside its traditional mandate </s>
<s> In the British Ministry of Defence requested the Commission s assistance to design and construct unk in the Falkland Islands for those killed during the unk War </s>
<s> Although these unk are not Commonwealth War Graves Commission unk the Commission manages the administrative responsibilities of these unk </s>
<s> Since the Commission has carried out similar management duties on behalf of the British Ministry of Defence for unk and graves of British and Imperial soldiers who died during the Second Boer War </s>
<s> In Veterans Affairs Canada employed the Commission to develop an approach to locate grave markers for which the Canadian Minister of Veterans Affairs has responsibility </s>
<s> As of the Commission conducts a twelve year cyclical inspection programme of Canadian veterans markers installed at the expense of the Government of Canada </s>
<s> In an unk excavation discovered mass graves on the edge of unk Wood outside of unk </s>
<s> Two hundred and fifty British and Australian bodies were excavated from five mass graves which were interred in the newly constructed unk unk Wood Military Cemetery </s>
<s> This was the first new Commonwealth War Graves Commission cemetery in more than years the last such unk having been built after the Second World War </s>
<s> unk sites and memorials The Commission is currently responsible for the continued commemoration of </s>
<s> million deceased Commonwealth military service members in countries and approximately civilians who died as a result of enemy action during World War II </s>
<s> Commonwealth military service members are commemorated by name on either a unk at an identified site of a burial or on a memorial </s>
<s> As a result the Commission is currently responsible for the care of war dead at over separate burial sites and maintenance of more than memorials worldwide </s>
<s> The vast majority of burial sites are pre existing communal or municipal unk and parish unk located in the United Kingdom however the Commission has itself constructed approximately war unk worldwide </s>
<s> The Commission has also constructed or commissioned memorials to commemorate the dead who have no known grave the largest of these is the unk Memorial </s>
<s> unk for inclusion The Commission only commemorates those who have died during the designated war years while in Commonwealth military service or of causes attributable to service </s>
<s> The applicable periods of consideration are August to August for the First World War and September to December for the Second World War </s>
<s> The end date for the First World War period is the official end of the war while for the Second World War the Commission selected a date approximately the same period after unk Day as the official end of the First World War was after the Armistice </s>
<s> unk who died as a result of enemy action during the Second World War are commemorated differently from those that died as a result of military service </s>
<s> They are commemorated by name through the Civilian War Dead Roll of Honour located in St George s Chapel in Westminster Abbey </s>
<s> In addition to its mandated duties the Commission maintains under arrangement with applicable governments over non Commonwealth war graves and over non war military and civilian graves </s>

<s> Cemetery design Common architectural design features Structural design has always played an important part in the Commission s unk </s>
<s> Apart from a few exceptions due to local geological conditions the unk follow the same design and uniform aesthetic all over the world </s>
<s> This makes the unk easily recognisable and distinguishes them from war graves administered by other groups or countries </s>
<s> A typical cemetery is surrounded by a low wall or hedge and with a wrought iron gate entrance </s>
<s> For unk in France and Belgium a land unk near the entrance or along a wall identifies the cemetery grounds as having been provided by the French or Belgian governments </s>
<s> All but the smallest unk contain a register with an inventory of the burials a plan of the plots and rows and a basic history of the cemetery </s>
<s> The register is located within a metal cupboard that is marked with a cross located in either the wall near the cemetery entrance or in a shelter within the cemetery </s>
<s> More recently in larger sites a stainless steel notice gives details of the respective military campaign </s>
<s> The unk within the cemetery are of a uniform size and design and mark plots of equal size </s>
<s> The cemetery grounds are except in drier climates grass covered with a floral border around the unk </s>
<s> There is also an absence of any paving between the unk rows which is intended to make the cemetery feel like a traditional walled garden where visitors could experience a sense of peace </s>
<s> However Carter and Jackson argue that the uniform aesthetics are designed to evoke a positive experience which deliberately masks and unk the nature of the war deaths </s>
<s> Cross of unk and Stone of Remembrance Typically unk of more than graves contain a Cross of unk designed by architect Reginald unk </s>
<s> This cross was designed to imitate medieval crosses found in unk in England with proportions more commonly seen in the Celtic cross </s>
<s> The cross is normally a unk four point limestone Latin cross mounted on an octagonal base and ranging in height from to feet </s>
<s> A bronze unk blade down is embedded on the face of the cross </s>
<s> This cross represents the faith of the majority of the dead and the sword represents the military character of the cemetery intended to link British soldiers and the Christian concept of self sacrifice </s>
<s> unk with more than burials typically have a Stone of Remembrance designed by Edwin unk with the inscription Their Name unk for unk </s>
<s> The concept of the Stone of Remembrance stone was developed by unk Kipling to commemorate those of all faiths and none respectively </s>
<s> In contrast to the Cross of unk the design for the stone deliberately avoided shapes associated with particular religions </s>
<s> The geometry of the structure was based on studies of the unk </s>
<s> Each stone is </s>
<s> metres ft long and </s>
<s> metres </s>
<s> ft high </s>
<s> The shape of the stone has been compared both to that of a sarcophagus and an altar </s>
<s> The feature was designed using the principle of unk </s>
<s> The subtle curves in the design if extended would form a sphere unk feet inches unk </s>
<s> m in diameter </s>
<s> unk Every grave is marked with a unk </s>
<s> Each unk contains the national emblem or regimental badge rank name unit date of death and age of each casualty inscribed above an appropriate religious symbol and a more personal dedication chosen by relatives </s>
<s> The unk use a standard upper case unk designed by MacDonald Gill </s>
<s> Individual graves are arranged where possible in straight rows and marked by uniform unk the vast majority of which are made of Portland stone </s>
<s> The original unk dimensions were centimetres in tall cm in wide and </s>
<s> cm </s>
<s> in thick </s>
<s> Most unk are inscribed with a cross except for those deceased known to be unk or non Christian </s>
<s> In the case of burials of Victoria Cross or George Cross recipients the regimental badge is supplemented by the Victoria Cross or George Cross emblem </s>
<s> Sometimes a soldier employed a pseudonym because they were too young to serve or were sought by law enforcement in such cases their primary name is shown along with the unk served as </s>
<s> Many unk are for unidentified casualties they consequently bear only what could be discovered from the body </s>
<s> The unk developed by unk Kipling that appears on the graves of unidentified soldiers for which no details are known is A Soldier of the Great War known unk God </s>
<s> Some unk bear the text believed to be buried in this cemetery when they are believed to be buried in the cemetery but the exact location of the grave is not known </s>
<s> In some cases soldiers were buried in collective graves and distinguishing one body from another was not possible and thus one unk covers more than one grave </s>
<s> The unk does not denote any specific details of the death except for its date and even then only if it is known and are deliberately ambiguous about the cause of death </s>
<s> Due to local conditions it was sometimes necessary for the Commission to deviate from its standard design </s>
<s> In places prone to extreme weather or earthquakes such as Thailand and Turkey stone faced pedestal markers are used instead of the normal unk </s>
<s> These measures are intended to prevent masonry being damaged during earthquakes or sinking into unk ground </s>
<s> In Italy unk were carved from unk unk limestone because it was in more plentiful supply </s>
<s> In unk Military Cemetery in Greece to avoid risk of earthquake damage small unk are laid flat on the ground </s>
<s> The smaller size of the markers mean that they often lack unit insignia </s>
<s> unk Commission unk are distinctive in treating unk as an integral part of the cemetery design </s>
<s> Originally the unk concept was to create an environment where visitors could experience a sense of peace in a setting in contrast to traditionally bleak unk </s>
<s> unk given by Arthur William Hill the Assistant Director of the Royal unk Gardens at unk enabled the Commission to develop cemetery layouts and architectural structures that took into account the placement of suitable plant life </s>
<s> unk structural and unk elements was not unfamiliar to the Commission s architects </s>
