<s> Where possible indigenous plants were utilised to enhance sentimental associations with the gardens of home </s>

<s> The beds around each unk are planted with a mixture of unk unk and unk unk </s>
<s> Low growing plants are chosen for areas immediately in front of unk ensuring that inscriptions are not obscured and preventing soil from unk back during rain </s>

<s> Lawn paths add to the garden unk and are irrigated during the dry season in countries where there is insufficient rain </s>
<s> Where irrigation is inappropriate or impractical dry unk is an ecological alternative favoured by the Commission s unk as is the case in Iraq </s>

<s> unk and unk Immediately following the First World War the British Army remained responsible for the unk of remains </s>

<s> Despite the unk searches bodies continued to be discovered in numbers </s>

<s> In the mid to bodies were being discovered weekly </s>
<s> The discovery of remains of First and Second World War casualties remains a common occurrence with approximately bodies discovered annually </s>
<s> For example in eight bodies of Canadian soldiers from the Battalion Winnipeg unk unk were discovered in a backyard in unk France </s>

<s> In March the remains of Commonwealth and German soldiers were discovered in unk le unk France with the Commonwealth soldiers being subsequently reburied at unk British Cemetery </s>
<s> When the remains of a Commonwealth soldier from the First or Second World War is discovered the Commission is notified and a Commission burial officer tries to collect any associated artifacts that may help in identify the remains </s>
<s> The details are then registered and archived at the Commission s unk the collection of evidence can include artifacts with the remains unk data and DNA </s>
<s> The archival records of the commission are open to the public to permit individuals to conduct their own research </s>
<s> Investigation of archival records by members of the public periodically result in the identification of previously buried casualties </s>

<s> German Type unk I submarine The Type unk I was a class of small coastal submarines U boats built in Germany at the beginning of the First World War </s>
<s> boats were constructed most of which went into service with the German Imperial Navy </s>
<s> Boats of this design were also operated by the Austro Hungarian Navy unk und unk Kriegsmarine or unk Kriegsmarine and the Bulgarian Navy </s>
<s> The group is sometimes known as the unk class after SM unk the class leader </s>
<s> In the Austro Hungarian Navy it was called the U class </s>
<s> Built to meet the need for small unk submarines able to operate in the narrow shallow seas off Flanders the vessels were intended to be quickly constructed then shipped by rail and assembled at their port of operation </s>
<s> The design effort began in mid August and by mid October the first boats were ordered from two German shipyards </s>
<s> The German Imperial Navy subsequently ordered an additional pair of boats to replace two sold to Austria Hungary who ordered a further three boats in April </s>
<s> A total of unk Is were built </s>
<s> Construction of the first boats for Germany began in early November all were completed by October </s>
<s> Several of the first boats underwent trials in German home waters but the rest were assembled and tested at either Antwerp or Pola </s>
<s> The German boats operated primarily in the Flanders Baltic and Constantinople unk </s>
<s> The boats were about metres ft long and displaced tonnes long tons when surfaced and tonnes long tons while submerged </s>
<s> All had two bow torpedo tubes and two torpedoes and were equipped with a deck mounted machine gun </s>
<s> In four of the surviving German boats were converted into coastal unk </s>
<s> Of the seventeen boats in German service two were sold to Austria Hungary one was sold to Bulgaria and nine were lost during the war </s>
<s> One of the five Austro Hungarian boats was sunk and another mined and not repaired </s>
<s> The five surviving German boats the four surviving Austro Hungarian boats and the Bulgarian boat were all turned over to the Allies after the end of the war and were broken up </s>
<s> Design In the earliest stages of the First World War the German Army s rapid advance along the North Sea coast found the German Imperial Navy without submarines suitable to operate in the narrow and shallow seas off Flanders </s>
<s> By August two weeks after the German invasion of Belgium the planning of a series of small coastal submarines had already begun </s>
<s> The German Imperial Navy stipulated that the submarines must be unk by rail which imposed a maximum diameter of </s>
<s> metres ft in </s>
<s> The rushed planning effort which had been assigned the name Project resulted in the Type unk I design created specifically for operation from Flanders </s>
<s> The boats were to be about metres ft long and to displace about tonnes long tons with two bow torpedo tubes </s>
<s> Boats of the Type unk I design were built by two manufacturers Germaniawerft of Kiel and AG unk of unk which led to some variations in boats from the two shipyards </s>
<s> The eight Germaniawerft built boats were slightly longer at </s>
<s> metres ft in length overall while the twelve unk built boats came in centimetres </s>
<s> in shorter than their counterparts </s>
<s> All were </s>
<s> metres ft in abeam and had a draft of </s>
<s> metres ft in </s>
<s> The boats all displaced tonnes long tons while surfaced but differed slightly in displacement submerged </s>
<s> The slightly longer Germaniawerft boats displaced tonnes long tons while submerged as they weighed unk </s>
<s> long tons more than the unk boats </s>
<s> The unk of the boats consisted of a single propeller shaft driven by a unk Germaniawerft or unk unk diesel engine on the surface or a unk unk electric motor for underwater travel </s>
<s> The unk boats were capable of nearly </s>
<s> knots </s>
<s> km h </s>
<s> mph on the surface and a little more than knots km h </s>
<s> mph submerged </s>
<s> The Germaniawerft boats were about knot </s>
<s> km h </s>
<s> mph slower than their unk made counterparts </s>
<s> The boats were equipped with two unk </s>
<s> in bow torpedo tubes and carried two torpedoes </s>
<s> They were also armed with a single millimetre </s>
<s> in machine gun affixed to the deck </s>
<s> Construction The German Imperial Navy ordered its first fifteen Type unk I boats on October </s>
<s> Eight boats numbered unk to unk were ordered from Germaniawerft of Kiel and seven boats numbered unk to U from AG unk of unk </s>
<s> After two of the class unk and unk were sold in February to ally Austria Hungary becoming U and U in the Austro Hungarian Navy the German Imperial Navy ordered unk and unk from unk </s>
<s> A further three for Austria Hungary U U and U had been ordered from unk by April bringing the total number constructed to </s>
<s> unk and unk were laid down on November at the Germaniawerft yard at Kiel </s>
<s> unk was launched on January just working days later </s>
<s> unk s launch followed on February </s>
<s> Among the unk boats unk was laid down first on November and launched on February a week ahead of unk </s>
<s> These first three boats launched underwent trials in home waters but most of the other members of the class were shipped via rail and underwent trials at their assembly point </s>
<s> The process of shipping the submarines by rail involved breaking the submarines down into what was essentially a knock down kit </s>
<s> Each boat was broken into approximately fifteen pieces and loaded on to eight railway unk </s>
<s> Type unk I boats destined for service with the Flanders Flotilla made a five day journey to Antwerp for the unk to three week assembly process </s>
<s> After assembly at Antwerp the boats were towed by barge to Bruges for trials </s>
<s> Boats selected for service in the Mediterranean were sent to the Austro Hungarian port of Pola for assembly </s>
<s> The total time from departure of the unk from the shipyard to operational readiness for the boats was about six weeks </s>
<s> By July all seventeen of the German Imperial Navy Type unk Is had been completed </s>
<s> Service During their trials the Type unk Is were found to be too small and too slow and had a reputation for being unk one commander compared his Type unk I to a unk machine </s>
<s> According to authors R H Gibson and Maurice unk in their book The German unk War the unk did not have enough power to chase down unk while surfaced and lacked the endurance to spend any extended amount of time underwater exhausting their batteries after little over an hour s running </s>
<s> In service use revealed another problem with a single propeller shaft engine combination if either component failed the U boat was almost totally disabled </s>
<s> Another reported problem with the Type unk Is was the tendency to break trim after the firing of torpedoes </s>
<s> The boats were equipped with unk tanks designed to flood and offset the loss of the C torpedo s pound kg weight but this system did not always function properly as a result when firing from unk depth the boat could unk after firing or if too much weight was taken on unk to the depths </s>
<s> When unk torpedoed and sank Italian submarine unk in June the tank failed to properly compensate forcing the entire crew to run to the stern to offset the trim imbalance </s>
<s> Despite the problems the tin unk as the Germans referred to them were in active service from March through the end of the war with half of the boats lost during the war </s>
<s> Boats of the class served in three navies the German Imperial Navy the Austro Hungarian Navy and the Bulgarian Navy </s>
<s> In German service they served primarily in the Flanders Flotilla the Baltic Flotilla and the Constantinople Flotilla </s>
<s> German Imperial Navy Flanders Flotilla The first Type unk I to enter service was unk which formed the nucleus of the Flanders Flotilla on March </s>
<s> By the end of April five more Type unk I boats had become operational </s>
<s> unk was eventually joined in the Flanders Flotilla by unk unk unk unk unk unk unk and unk of these only unk made the journey to Flanders by sea rather than rail </s>
<s> unk departed on the first patrol from Flanders on April and was responsible for sinking the first ship sent down by the flotilla </s>
<s> The Type unk I boats of the Flanders Flotilla originally patrolled the area between the United Kingdom and the Netherlands but began patrolling the English Channel after unk pioneered a route past British unk nets and mines in the Straits of Dover in late June </s>
<s> Over the Type unk Is first year of service unk and unk were both lost and unk and unk were transferred to the Baltic Flotilla </s>

<s> The pair renamed U and U respectively were joined by U U and U in October </s>

<s> the former German unk Key Military history of Gibraltar during World War II The military history of Gibraltar during World War II exemplifies Gibraltar s position as a British fortress since the early century and as a vital factor in British military strategy both as a foothold on the continent of Europe and as a unk of British sea power </s>
<s> During World War II Gibraltar served a vital role in both the Atlantic Theatre and the Mediterranean Theatre controlling virtually all naval traffic into and out of the Mediterranean Sea from the Atlantic Ocean </s>
<s> In addition to its commanding position Gibraltar provided a strongly defended harbour from which ships could operate in both the Atlantic and the Mediterranean </s>
<s> Force H under the command of Vice Admiral James unk was based in Gibraltar and had the task of maintaining naval superiority and providing a strong escort for convoys to and from the besieged island of Malta </s>
<s> During the course of the war Gibraltar came under aerial bombardment from unk French aircraft and from aircraft of the Italian Royal Air Force Regia unk based on Sardinia </s>

<s> unk of rock were blasted out to build an underground city </s>

<s> Operation Felix The Rock came through the war relatively unscathed but given its strategic importance Germany made plans to capture Gibraltar </s>

<s> Operation unk Operation unk was a top secret British stay behind unk mission that was only to be implemented if Gibraltar was captured by the Axis Powers </s>

<s> Death of Wadysaw unk On July a Liberator bomber from RAF Transport Command took off from Gibraltar for England </s>

<s> Emperor unk On September unk was assassinated in a palace conspiracy organised by court officials </s>
<s> The unk unk the unk Calendar records that the same day the Senate proclaimed Marcus unk unk emperor </s>
<s> Despite his political experience this was a remarkable choice </s>
<s> unk was old and unk and had spent much of his career out of the public light prompting both ancient and modern authors to speculate on his involvement in unk s assassination </s>
<s> According to unk unk the conspirators approached unk as a potential successor prior to the assassination which indicates that he was at least aware of the plot </s>
<s> unk by contrast does not mention unk but he may have omitted his role out of unk </s>
<s> Considering the works of unk were published under unk s direct descendants Trajan and unk it would have been less than sensitive of him to suggest the dynasty owed its accession to murder </s>
<s> On the other hand unk lacked widespread support in the Empire and as a known unk loyalist his track record would not have recommended him to the conspirators </s>
<s> The precise facts have been obscured by history but modern historians believe unk was proclaimed Emperor solely on the initiative of the Senate within hours after the news of the assassination broke </s>
<s> Although he appeared to be an unlikely candidate on account of his age and weak health unk was considered a safe choice precisely because he was old and unk </s>
<s> Furthermore he had close connections with the unk dynasty and commanded the respect of a substantial part of the Senate </s>
<s> unk had seen the anarchy which had resulted from the death of unk he knew that to unk even for a few hours could lead to violent civil conflict </s>
<s> Rather than decline the invitation and risk unk he accepted </s>
<s> The decision may have been hasty so as to avoid civil war but neither the Senate nor unk appears to have been involved in the conspiracy against unk </s>
<s> Following the accession of unk as emperor the Senate passed unk unk on unk his coins and statues were melted his arches were torn down and his name was erased from all public records </s>
<s> In many instances existing portraits of unk such as those found on the unk unk were simply unk to fit the likeness of unk </s>
<s> This allowed quick production of new images and recycling of previous material </s>
<s> In addition the vast palace which unk had erected on the unk Hill known as the unk Palace was renamed the House of the People and unk himself took up residence in unk s former villa in the Gardens of unk </s>
<s> Administration The change of government was welcome particularly to the unk who had been harshly persecuted during unk s reign </s>
<s> As an immediate gesture of goodwill towards his supporters unk publicly unk that no unk would be put to death as long as he remained in office </s>
<s> He called an end to trials based on treason released those who had been imprisoned under these charges and granted amnesty to many who had been exiled </s>
<s> All properties which had been confiscated by unk were returned to their respective families </s>
<s> unk also sought to involve the Senate in his government but this was not entirely successful </s>
<s> He continued to rely largely on friends and advisors that were known and trusted and by maintaining friendly relations with the pro unk faction of the Senate he incurred hostility which may have been the cause for at least one conspiracy against his life </s>
<s> Having been proclaimed emperor solely on the initiative of the Senate unk had to introduce a number of measures to gain support among the Roman populace </s>
<s> As was custom by this time a change of emperor was expected to bring with it a generous payment of gifts and money to the people and the army </s>
<s> Accordingly a unk of unk per head was bestowed upon the citizens while the soldiers of the unk Guard received a unk which may have amounted to as much as unk per person </s>
<s> This was followed by a string of economic reforms intended to alleviate the burden of taxation from the most unk Romans </s>
<s> To the poorest unk granted unk of land worth up to million unk </s>
<s> He unk parents and their children from a inheritance tax and he made loans to Italian landowners on the condition that they pay interest of to their municipality to support the children of unk families unk schemes which were later expanded by Trajan unk Pius and Marcus Aurelius </s>
<s> Furthermore numerous taxes were unk and privileges granted to Roman provinces </s>
<s> unk he probably abolished the unk unk the additional tax which all Jews throughout the Empire had to pay some of his coins bear the legend unk unk unk unk abolition of malicious prosecution regarding the Jewish tax </s>
<s> Before long unk s expenses strained the economy of Rome and although perhaps not ruinous to the extent once suggested by unk necessitated the formation of a special commission of economy to drastically reduce unk </s>
<s> The most superfluous religious sacrifices games and horse races were abolished while new income was generated from unk s former possessions including the unk of ships estates and even furniture </s>
<s> Large amounts of money were obtained from unk s silver and gold statues and unk forbade that similar images be made in his honor </s>
<s> Because he reigned only briefly unk s public works were few instead completing projects which had been initiated under unk rule </s>
<s> This included extensive repairs to the Roman road system and the expansion of the unk </s>

<s> The only major landmarks constructed under unk were a unk known as the unk unk and a small Imperial unk begun by unk which linked the unk of Augustus to the Temple of Peace </s>
<s> Little remains partly because the Via unk unk unk cuts across it </s>
<s> Crisis of succession Despite unk s measures to remain popular with the Senate and the Roman people support for unk remained strong in the army which had called for his unk immediately after the assassination </s>
<s> In an attempt to appease the soldiers of the unk Guard unk had dismissed their prefect Titus unk unk one of the chief conspirators against unk and replaced him with a former commander unk unk </s>
<s> Likewise the generous unk bestowed upon the soldiers following his accession was expected to swiftly silence any protests against the violent regime change </s>
<s> The unk considered these measures insufficient however and demanded the execution of unk s assassins which unk refused </s>
<s> Continued dissatisfaction with this state of affairs would ultimately lead to the unk crisis of unk s reign </s>
<s> While the swift transfer of power following unk s death had prevented a civil war from unk unk s position as an emperor soon proved too vulnerable and his benign nature turned into a reluctance to assert his authority </s>
<s> Upon his accession he had ordered a halt to treason trials but at the same time allowed the prosecution of unk by the Senate to continue </s>
<s> This measure led to chaos as everyone acted in his own interests while trying to settle scores with personal enemies leading the consul unk to famously remark that unk s unk was ultimately unk to unk s anarchy </s>
<s> Early in a conspiracy led by the senator unk unk unk unk unk unk failed but once again unk refused to put the conspirators to death much to the disapproval of the Senate </s>
<s> The situation was further aggravated by the absence of a clear successor made more pressing because of unk s old age and sickness </s>
<s> He had no natural children of his own and only distant relatives who were unsuited for political office </s>
<s> A successor would have to be chosen from among the governors or generals in the Empire and it appears that by unk was considering to adopt Marcus Cornelius unk unk unk the powerful governor of Syria </s>
<s> This was covertly opposed by those who supported the more popular military commander Marcus unk unk commonly known as Trajan a general of the armies at the German frontier </s>
<s> In October these tensions came to a head when the unk Guard led by unk unk laid siege to the Imperial Palace and took unk hostage </s>
<s> He was forced to submit to their demands agreeing to hand over those responsible for unk s death and even giving a speech unk the rebellious unk </s>

<s> Shortly thereafter he announced the adoption of Trajan as his successor and with this decision all but abdicated </s>
<s> Trajan was formally bestowed with the title of Caesar and shared the unk with unk in Contrary to the view here popularized by unk unk however unk had in fact little choice with regard to his successor </s>

<s> The only candidate with sufficient military experience unk ancestry and connections was Trajan </s>
<s> Likewise Edward unk s assertion that unk unk established a tradition of succession through adoption among the Five Good unk has found little support among modern historians </s>
<s> Death and legacy On January at the start of his fourth unk unk suffered a stroke during a private audience </s>

<s> He was deified by the Senate and his ashes were laid to rest in the unk of Augustus </s>

<s> Due to the lack of written sources on this period much of unk s life has remained obscure </s>
<s> The most substantial surviving account of the reign of unk was written by the century historian unk unk </s>
<s> His Roman History which spans nearly a millennium from the arrival of unk in Italy until the year unk was composed more than one hundred years after unk had died </s>

<s> Unfortunately a substantial part of the work has been lost with only the first five books covering the Year of the Four unk remaining </s>
<s> In the introduction to his biography of unk Julius unk however unk speaks highly of unk describing his reign as the dawn of a most happy age when unk Caesar blended things once unk sovereignty and freedom </s>
<s> The surviving histories speak equally positively of unk s brief reign although none offer a substantial commentary on his policies </s>
<s> Both unk unk and Aurelius Victor emphasize his wisdom and unk with unk commending his decision to adopt Trajan as his heir </s>
<s> These views were later popularized by the century historian Edward unk in his History of the Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire </s>
<s> unk considered unk the first of the Five Good unk five successive rulers under whom the Roman Empire was governed by absolute power under the guidance of wisdom and virtue from until </s>
<s> Nevertheless even unk notes that compared to his successors unk may have lacked the necessary qualifications for a successful reign Modern history has expanded upon this sentiment characterizing unk as a well unk but weak and unk ruler </s>
<s> The Roman Senate enjoyed renewed liberties under his rule but unk s unk of the state finances and lack of authority over the army ultimately brought Rome near the edge of a significant crisis </s>
<s> The mutiny led by unk unk was never intended as a coup but a calculated attempt to put pressure on the emperor </s>
<s> The adoption of Trajan expanded his power base with a respected reliable general as his successor </s>
<s> unk concludes that unk s real talents were in fact ill suited to the unk His place in Roman history is therefore summarized as a necessary if tumultuous stop gap before the unk unk dynasties </s>
<s> It is a fact of irony that even the only major public work completed during his reign the unk of unk ultimately became known as the unk unk or transitional forum </s>

<s> The unk film The unk is a American drama film directed by Robert unk from Walter unk s novel of the same name adapted for the screen by unk and Sidney Carroll </s>
<s> It tells the story of small time pool unk Fast Eddie unk and his desire to break into the major league of professional unk and high stakes unk by high unk that follows it </s>
<s> He throws his raw talent and ambition up against the best player in the country seeking to best the legendary pool player Minnesota unk </s>
<s> After initially losing to unk and getting involved with unk manager Bert Gordon Eddie returns to try again but only after paying a terrible personal price </s>
<s> The film was shot on location in New York City </s>
<s> It stars Paul Newman as Fast Eddie unk Jackie Gleason as Minnesota unk Piper Laurie as Sarah and George C Scott as Bert </s>
<s> The unk was a major critical and popular success gaining a reputation as a modern classic </s>
<s> Its exploration of winning losing and character garnered a number of major awards it is also credited with helping to spark a resurgence in the popularity of pool </s>
<s> Real life pool player Rudolf unk known at the time as New York unk and Chicago unk claimed to be the real life inspiration for Gleason s character Minnesota unk and adopted the name as his own </s>
<s> Plot Small time pool unk Fast Eddie unk travels cross country with his partner Charlie to challenge the legendary player Minnesota unk </s>
<s> Arriving at unk home pool hall Eddie declares he will win that night </s>
<s> unk arrives and he and Eddie agree to play straight pool for a game </s>
<s> After initially falling behind Eddie unk back to being ahead and suggests raising the bet to a game unk agrees </s>
<s> He sends out a runner Preacher to Johnny s Bar ostensibly for whiskey but really to get professional unk Bert Gordon to the hall </s>
<s> Eddie gets ahead and Charlie tries to convince him to quit but Eddie insists the game will end only when unk says it is over </s>
<s> unk agrees to continue after Bert labels Eddie a loser </s>
<s> After hours and an entire bottle of unk Eddie is ahead over but loses it all along with all but of his original stake </s>
<s> At their hotel later Eddie leaves half of the remaining stake with a sleeping Charlie and leaves </s>
<s> Eddie unk his belongings at the local bus terminal where he meets Sarah unk an alcoholic who is supported by her father attends college part time and walks with a limp </s>
<s> He meets her again at a bar </s>
<s> They go back to her place but she refuses to let him in saying he is too hungry </s>
<s> Eddie moves into a unk house and starts unk for small stakes </s>
<s> He finds Sarah again and this time she takes him in but with reservations </s>
<s> Charlie finds Eddie at Sarah s and tries to persuade him to go back out on the road </s>
<s> Eddie refuses and Charlie realizes he plans to challenge unk again </s>
<s> Eddie realizes that Charlie held out his percentage and becomes enraged believing that with that money he could have rebounded to beat unk </s>
<s> Eddie dismisses Charlie as a scared old man and tells him to go lie down and die by himself </s>
<s> At Johnny s Bar Eddie joins a poker game where Bert is playing and loses </s>
<s> Afterward Bert tells Eddie that he has talent as a pool player but no character </s>
<s> He figures that Eddie will need at least to challenge unk again </s>
<s> Bert calls him a born loser but nevertheless offers to stake him in return for of his unk Eddie refuses </s>
<s> Eddie unk a local pool shark exposing himself as a unk and the other players punish him by breaking his unk </s>
<s> As he unk Sarah cares for him and tells him she loves him but he cannot say the words in return </s>
<s> When Eddie is ready to play he agrees to Bert s terms deciding that a slice of something big is better than a slice of nothing </s>
<s> Bert Eddie and Sarah travel to the Kentucky Derby where Bert unk a match for Eddie against a wealthy local unk named unk </s>
<s> The game turns out to be unk unk not pool </s>
<s> When Eddie loses badly Bert refuses to keep unk him </s>
<s> Sarah pleads with Eddie to leave with her saying that the world he is living in and its inhabitants are unk twisted and crippled he refuses </s>
<s> Seeing Eddie s anger Bert agrees to let the match continue at a game </s>
<s> Eddie comes back to win </s>
<s> He collects his share and decides to walk back to the hotel </s>
<s> Bert arrives first and subjects Sarah to a humiliating sexual encounter </s>
<s> After she unk unk unk and unk in lipstick on the bathroom mirror </s>
<s> Eddie arrives back at the hotel to learn that she has killed herself </s>
<s> Eddie returns to challenge unk again putting up his entire stake on a single game </s>
<s> He wins game after game beating unk so badly that unk is forced to quit </s>
<s> Bert demands a share of Eddie s unk and threatens that Eddie will be injured unless he pays </s>
<s> But Eddie says that if he is not killed he will kill Bert when he recovers invoking the memory of Sarah he unk Bert into giving up his claim </s>
<s> Instead Bert orders Eddie never to walk into a big time pool hall again </s>

<s> Cast Cast notes Pool champion Willie unk has a cameo appearance as Willie who holds the stakes for Eddie and unk s games </s>

<s> Production The unk novel had been optioned several times including by Frank Sinatra but attempts to adapt it for the screen were unsuccessful </s>
<s> Director unk s daughter Carol unk speculates that previous adaptations focused too much on the pool aspects of the story and not enough on the human interaction </s>
<s> unk who had unk pool himself as a youth and who had made an abortive attempt to write a pool themed play called Corner Pocket optioned the book and teamed with Sidney Carroll to produce the script </s>
<s> According to Bobby unk s agent Martin Baum Paul Newman s agent turned down the part of Fast Eddie </s>
<s> Newman was originally unavailable to play Fast Eddie regardless being committed to star opposite Elizabeth Taylor in the film Two for the unk </s>
<s> unk offered unk the part after seeing him on The Mike Wallace Interview </s>
<s> When Taylor was forced to drop out of unk because of shooting unk on Cleopatra Newman was freed up to take the role which he accepted after reading just half of the script </s>
<s> No one associated with the production officially notified unk or his representatives that he had been replaced they found out from a member of the public at a charity horse race </s>
<s> unk filmed The unk over six weeks entirely in New York City </s>
<s> Much of the action was filmed at two now defunct pool halls unk s and Ames unk Academy </s>
<s> Other shooting locations included a unk on East Street which served as the Louisville home of Murray Hamilton s character unk and the Manhattan unk bus terminal </s>
<s> The film crew built a dining area that was so realistic that confused passengers sat there and waited to place their orders </s>
<s> Willie unk served as technical advisor on the film and shot a number of the trick shots in place of the actors </s>
<s> All of Gleason s shots were his own they were filmed in wide angle to emphasize having the actor and the shot in the same frames </s>
<s> unk in pursuit of the style he termed neo neo realistic hired actual street thugs enrolled them in the Screen Actors Guild and used them as extras </s>
<s> Scenes that were included in the shooting script but did not make it into the final film include a scene at Ames pool hall establishing that Eddie is on his way to town originally slated to be the first scene of the film and a longer scene of Preacher talking to Bert at Johnny s Bar which establishes Preacher is a unk </s>
<s> Early shooting put more focus on the pool playing but during filming unk made the decision to place more emphasis on the love story between Newman and Laurie s characters </s>
<s> Despite the change in emphasis unk still used the various pool games to show the strengthening of Eddie s character and the evolution of his relationship to Bert and Sarah through the positioning of the characters in the frame </s>
<s> For example when Eddie is playing unk Eddie is positioned below Bert in a two shot but above unk while still below Bert in a three shot </s>
<s> When Sarah enters the room she is below Eddie in two shot while in a three shot Eddie is still below Bert </s>
<s> When Eddie is kneeling over Sarah s body Bert again appears above him but Eddie attacks Bert ending up on top of him </s>
<s> Eddie finally appears above Bert in two shot when Eddie returns to beat unk </s>
<s> Themes The unk is fundamentally a story of what it means to be a human being unk within the context of winning and losing </s>
<s> Describing the film Robert unk said My protagonist Fast Eddie wants to become a great pool player but the film is really about the obstacles he encounters in attempting to fulfill himself as a human being </s>
<s> He unk self awareness only after a terrible personal tragedy which he has caused and then he wins his pool game </s>
<s> Roger unk unk with this assessment citing The unk as one of the few American movies in which the hero wins by surrendering by accepting reality instead of his dreams </s>
<s> The film was also somewhat autobiographical for unk relating to his dealings with the House Un American Activities Committee </s>
<s> A screenwriter during the and he had been involved with the Communist Party in the and refused to name names at his first unk appearance </s>
<s> Ultimately he changed his mind and identified friends and colleagues as party members </s>
<s> Similarly unk sells his soul and betrays the one person who really knows and loves him in a unk pact to gain character </s>
<s> Film and theatre historian unk unk has identified The unk as one of a handful of films from the early that re defined the relationship of films to their audiences </s>
<s> This new relationship he writes is one of challenge rather than unk of doubt rather than certainty </s>
<s> No film of the unk asserts took such a brutal clear look at the ego affirmation of the one on one contest at the unk of the winner or the unk vulnerability of the loser </s>
<s> Although some have suggested the resemblance of this film to classic film noir unk rejects the comparison based on unk s ultra realistic style also noting that the film lacks noir s unk Woman or its unk in discovering crime among the unk hungry bank clerks and unk wives </s>
<s> unk does note that while Fast Eddie has a slight fifties ring the character makes a decisive break with the extraordinarily feeling tough guys of the rebel era b unk he does end up seeking out his emotions and telling Bert that he is a loser because he s dead inside </s>
<s> Reception The unk had its world premiere in Washington DC on September </s>
<s> Prior to the premiere Richard Burton hosted a midnight screening of the film for the casts of the season s Broadway shows which generated a great deal of positive word of mouth </s>
<s> Initially reluctant to publicize the film Century Fox responded by stepping up its promotional activities </s>
<s> The film was well received by critics although with the occasional unk </s>
<s> Variety praised the performances of the entire main cast but felt that the unk aspects of the story prevented the film from achieving the goal of being pure entertainment </s>
<s> Variety also felt the film was far too long </s>
<s> Stanley unk writing for The New Republic concurred in part with this assessment </s>
<s> unk strongly praised the principal cast calling Newman first rate and writing that Scott s was his most credible performance to date </s>
<s> Laurie he writes gives her part unk unk touches although he also unk criticizes her for over reliance on Method acting </s>
<s> While he found that the script strains hard to give an air of menace and unk to the pool hall and also declares it full of pseudo meaning unk unk unk s sure economical direction especially in regard to Gleason who he says does not so much act as pose for a number of pictures which are well arranged by unk </s>
<s> It is the best use of a unk by a director since unk photographed unk unk as Big Daddy </s>
<s> The New York Times despite finding that the film unk a bit and that the romance between Newman and Laurie s characters seems a unk far unk nonetheless found that The unk speaks powerfully in a universal language that unk and reveals bitter truths </s>
<s> The unk received nine Academy Award nominations </s>

<s> unk unk s Years Movies unk Edition unk unk s Top Sports Film Legacy In the decades since its release The unk has cemented its reputation as a classic </s>
